title: Block Blast!
summary:
Enter the world of Block Blast, a fun and free block puzzle game where every move challenges your brain and strategy, rewarding you with satisfying crush effects as you blast cubes away. Whether you're seeking offline relaxation or looking to enhance your logic skills, Block Blast delivers an engaging puzzle experience.

ğŸŒŸ Why You'll Love Block Blast
ğŸ”¸ Vibrant Puzzle Adventure: Match colorful blocks on an 8x8 board, solve logic puzzles, and watch the cubes crush in a cascade of color.
ğŸ”¹ Strategic Combos & Streaks:
Use your brain to clear multiple lines of blocks in one move for powerful combos. Maintain your streaks to achieve massive scores!
ğŸ”¸ Casual Yet Challenging: Play at your own pace, relax your brain, or apply deep logic strategies to beat your highest score.
ğŸ”¹ Offline Fun, No WiFi Needed: Enjoy free block puzzle game anytime and anywhere, perfect for endless fun on-the-go.

title: Block Crush!
summary:
Welcome to Block Crush: A Free Wood Block Puzzle Game - Relax & Focus with Wood Blocksï¼

Immerse yourself in the calming pastime of Block Crush, a creative wood block puzzle game that brings a fresh, wooden twist to the classic Tetris-style gameplay. This free-to-play block crushing puzzle combines woodenized aesthetics with satisfying logic-based board challenges, perfect for fans of Tetris and similar block-stacking games. Built for stress relief, focus, and relaxation, it uses wooden bricks and minimalist design to create a serene brain teaser completely free from timers and pressure.

Clear lines through logicâ€”not luck. Every move is intentional, every solved puzzle rewarding. Whether you're looking to reset your mind or enjoy a strategic block-stacking session, Block Crush delivers a woody Tetris-like feeling that is both simple and deeply engaging. Itâ€™s the ideal choice for players who enjoy relaxing brain games, offline block puzzles, and addictive wood versions of Tetris.

ğŸ® KEY FEATURES:

â— Grainy Wood Block
Delight in the warmth and simplicity of minimalist wooden blocks in a visually soothing UI. Each wood block is designed to enhance focus and bring tactile satisfaction to your Tetris-inspired puzzle-solvingâ€”all for free.

â— Tetris-Style Block Crush Gameplay
Place wooden bricks on the 10x10 grid just like in Tetris, stack blocks to clear lines and columns, and prevent the board from filling. Easy to learn, challenging to master. Form strategies, spot patterns, and trigger satisfying blast combosâ€”all with free-form strategic thinking reminiscent of classic Tetris.

â— Relaxing Ambient Soundscape
Soft, subtle audio accompanies your every move. The sound harmonizes with the warm wood theme and enhances the rhythmic Tetris-like flow, making each line clear a gentle blast of achievement with satisfying ASMR enjoymentâ€”all completely free.

â— Fully Offline
Play this wood block puzzle anytime, anywhereâ€”no WiFi needed. Perfect for flights, commutes, or moments when you want an escape. Enjoy Tetris-inspired fun offline, totally free.

â— No Pressure, Your Pace
No timers. No penalties. No surprises. Pause and resume at will. This relaxed brick-clearing game emphasizes mindfulness and clarity over scores or speedâ€”a calming and addictive puzzle experience thatâ€™s totally free, with all the fun of Tetris and none of the stress.

â— Extra Daily Slide Puzzle for Both Adults and Kids
Slide Puzzle is an exciting bonus escape from Block Crush! Take on a new challenge every day completely free. Simply slide blocks, but plan wiselyâ€”each move rises all blocks one row, giving a fresh twist on classic block puzzle mechanics.

HOW TO PLAY:

Complete full rows or columns Tetris-style to clear blocks

Plan ahead to avoid filling the board

Chain clears to trigger combo blasts and maximize scores

Ideal for players who enjoy mindful puzzles, logic games, Tetris-like challenges, and family-friendly fun. Block Crush is more than a gameâ€”itâ€™s a quiet companion for mental breaks, focused sessions, or daily relaxation, and itâ€™s completely free.

Download now and unblock the unique satisfaction of a wood block puzzle game inspired by Tetris, designed for calm, relaxation, and thoughtful engagement. Whether you're a fan of Tetris, block puzzle classics, or wooden block games, this is the perfect free brain teaser for your collection!

title: Arrows â€“ Puzzle Escape
summary:
Welcome to Arrows â€“ Puzzle Escape, a minimalist puzzle game that challenges your logic, planning, and spatial thinking. Your goal is simple: extract each arrow without causing a collision.

ğŸ§  Features:
- Challenging logic puzzles that test your planning skills
- Thousands of handcrafted levels with increasing complexity
- Clean, minimalist design that lets you focus on the puzzle
- Relaxing, no-pressure gameplay â€“ no timers, just your brain
- Hint system to help when you're stuck

Whether you have a few minutes or want a longer challenge, Arrows â€“ Puzzle Escape is the perfect blend of strategy and calm.

Can you clear the grid without losing a single heart?

title: Last War:Survival Game
summary:
A global zombie infestation has converted many into zombies. As a survivor, your primary goal is to retain your humanity and survive.

- Think Fast, Move Faster!
Begin your journey with an intense survival challenge. Dodge and combat waves of zombies. It's not just about survival; it's about quick reflexes and strategic thinking, as each lane presents unique obstacles and zombies!

- Create Your Zombie-Free Shelter
Customize your base and expand your army - you are the light in this shelter, leading people towards a glimmer of hope. In this strategic game, your choices in building and developing your base will shape the future of your survivors in a world overrun by zombies.

- Assemble Your Dream Team
Assemble your ultimate team by recruiting heroes. With a choice of three military branches, each hero comes with their own unique skills. Combine different heroes to easily achieve victory against the zombies.

- Unite for the Greater Good
In the challenging world of zombies, survival is a team effort. Partner with players from all over the globe to battle the zombies. Stay alert â€“ alliances are complex, and not every survivor you encounter is friendly.

How long can you last in this apocalypse? Join Last War: Survival Game and embark on a thrilling journey of survival and strategy!

title: Kingshot
summary:
Kingshot is an innovative idle medieval survival game that combines strategic gameplay with rich details waiting to be explored.

When a sudden rebellion overturns the fate of an entire dynasty and ignites a devastating war, countless people lose their homes. In a world riddled with societal collapse, rebel invasions, rampant disease, and mobs desperate for resources, survival is the ultimate challenge. As a governor in these turbulent times, it's up to you to lead your people through these adversities, devising internal and diplomatic strategies to rekindle the spark of civilization.

[Core Features]

Defend Against Invasions
Stay vigilant and ready to repel invasions at any moment. Your town, the last bastion of hope, depends on it. Gather resources, upgrade your defenses, and prepare for battle to ensure survival in these tough times.

Manage Human Resources
Enjoy a unique gameplay mechanic involving the allocation of survivor roles such as workers, hunters, and chefs. Monitor their health and happiness to ensure they remain productive. Respond quickly to illness to make sure everyone receives timely treatment.

Establish Laws
Codes of law are vital for sustaining civilization and are crucial for the growth and strength of your town.

[Strategic Gameplay]

Resource Struggle
Amidst the sudden state collapse, the continent is flooded with untapped resources. Refugees, rebels, and power-hungry governors are all eyeing these precious materials. Ready yourself for battle and use every strategy at your disposal to secure these resources!

Battle for Power
Compete against other players for the ultimate honor of becoming the strongest governor in this grand strategy game. Claim the throne and reign supreme!

Forge Alliances
Ease the burden of survival in this chaotic world by forming or joining alliances. Collaborate with allies to rebuild civilization!

Recruit Heroes
The game features a roster of unique heroes, each waiting to be recruited. Bringing together heroes with various talents and skills is essential for taking the initiative and ensuring safety in these desperate times.

Compete with Other Governors
Hone your heroes' skills, assemble your squads, and challenge other governors. Victory not only earns you valuable points, but also grants access to rare items. Lead your town to the top of the rankings and showcase the rise of a great civilization.

Advance Technology
With the rebellion obliterating almost all technological advancements, it's crucial to start rebuilding and reclaiming the fragments of lost tech. The race to master cutting-edge technology could determine the dominator of this new world order!

[Stay Connected]
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/5cYPN24ftf

title: Water Matchâ„¢- ASMR Water Sort
summary:
â­ï¸ Why Play Water Match?

-Brain Training: Sorting sharpens observation, and solving puzzles boosts logic and intelligenceâ€”exercise your brain while having fun!
-Stress Relief: A relaxing way to unwind. Color sorting + exciting events = a calming yet thrilling experience.
-Sensory Delight: Visual and auditory triggers gently stimulate your senses, offering deep mental relaxation through gameplay!
-Sleep Aid: An immersive experience that provides a sense of achievement, ğŸŒ™ helping you escape pre-sleep anxiety.
-All-Age Fun: Casual puzzle gameplay with simple tapsâ€”kids and adults alike love the satisfaction of a perfect pour!


â­ï¸ Game Highlights: Immersive Gameplay That Keeps You Hooked

-Endless Content: Tons of water sort levels, limited-time events, and clever twists (mysterious colors, covered bottles) keep the game fresh.
-Perfect Difficulty Curve: Start with easy beginner levels, then tackle pro stages with hidden colorsâ€”brain training that never gets dull.
-Visually Friendly: 8 vibrant water shades, sleek bottle designs, and smooth animations (lifting, rippling water) make every tap a visual treat.
-Sound Satisfaction: ğŸµ Crisp glass clinks, delicate water-pouring sounds, and soothing music blend for a deeply relaxing audio experience.
-Play Offline: Enjoy anytime, anywhereâ€”no internet needed. Pause at will to fit your busy schedule.


â­ï¸ Water Sorting: Simple Moves, Smart Strategies

-Tap and Play: Just tap the bottles to enjoy the flow of colorful waterâ€”instantly relaxing!
-Collect Colorful Bottles: ğŸ Fill bottles with the same color, and they transform into gift bags. Collect them all for a huge sense of achievement!
-Brain-Teasing Fun: Which bottle to pour first? Which to save? Every move is a key step in solving a clever puzzle!

â­ï¸ In-Game Events & Leaderboards: Fun for Everyone

Whether tackling solo challenges, racing in real-time contests, or battling in guild wars, thereâ€™s a mode for you.Team up, compete with friends, and climb the leaderboard to show off your skills.Social fun turns solo puzzles into group celebrations!

Download Water Match Nowâ€”Your New Go-To Water Sort!

title: Royal Kingdom
summary:
From the creators of Royal Match comes a brand new match 3 puzzle adventure in Royal Kingdom, starring the extended Royal Family!

Youâ€™ll meet King Richard, King Robert's younger brother, as well as a charming cast of new characters, including Princess Bella and the Wizard, to embark on a journey to build legendary kingdoms! Solve match 3 puzzles to explore new lands and defeat the Dark King & his army!

MASTER MATCH 3 PUZZLES
Test your skills and become the ultimate match 3 expert by solving fun yet challenging puzzles! Beat thrilling levels and overcome unique obstacles!

BUILD AND EXPLORE KINGDOMS
With the help of the Builder, craft a kingdom befitting royalty. Solve puzzles, earn coins, and unlock diverse districts - from the Parliament Square to the University and the Princess Tower.

CONQUER THE DARK KING
Defend the kingdom from the Dark Kingâ€™s attack by solving match 3 puzzles - destroy his castles and evil minions to see him fall. Victory is one match away!

EXPAND YOUR RULING
Rise through the ranks and claim the top spot on the leaderboard, master your puzzle solving skills for generous rewards, and expand your kingdom by uncovering uncharted lands as you play!

ENJOY THE FINEST VISUALS
Immerse yourself in Royal Kingdom's stunning graphics and smooth animations. A puzzle game experience like never before - captivating and seamless.

What are you waiting for? Download Royal Kingdom and join the ranks of the noble adventurers! With hours of fun, challenging gameplay, and a magical world, this puzzle game is fit for royalty!

title: Mahjong Wondersâ„¢
summary:
Relaxing mahjong match puzzle with clear tiles and gentle pace.

Enjoy a clear and relaxing mahjong match game with easy-to-read tiles and smooth controls. Simple to play and gentle in pace, itâ€™s perfect for unwinding dailyâ€”especially for older players who enjoy calm and comfortable mahjong puzzles. This soothing mahjong tile puzzle fits naturally into a quiet, everyday routine.

ğŸ€„ Classic Mahjong Match
Experience a refreshing mahjong solitaire style built around familiar mahjong match rules. Tap and match two free mahjong tiles, clear the board, and enjoy patterns inspired by classic mahjong traditions. The steady pacing makes it comfortable for all ages who appreciate soothing tile-matching games.

ğŸ® Relaxing Tile-Matching Gameplay
Each level follows the classic mahjong idea: find matching pairs, remove tiles step by step, and gradually open new paths. Clear visuals and a gentle flow make it great for anyone who prefers calm, steady puzzles. Whether for quick breaks or a relaxing daily mahjong moment, the game fits smoothly into your day.

ğŸ§© Many Boards & Helpful Tools
Play hundreds of handcrafted mahjong layoutsâ€”from simple beginner boards to more thoughtful shapes. Hints, shuffle, and undo keep your mahjong match journey smooth and stress-free, especially for players who enjoy a comfortable, low-pressure flow. Every board offers a peaceful moment built around familiar mahjong tile-matching.

Enjoy a comforting and familiar mahjong puzzle anytime.

title: Piggy Clicker
summary:
The ULTIMATE pig-themed idle tapper is here!
300,000+ downloads!

Feed the super-cute piggies then ship them to market to earn the big bucks!
So easy to play and perfect for filling those idle moments in your life.
With dozens of cute (and/or downright bizzare) pigs to collect you'll be daydreaming about your ranch in no time!

WHAT IS PIGGY CLICKER?
The rules are easy!

(1) As pigs emerge from their pigsty, tap the field to feed them.
Once the truck is full of fat piggies, tap it to sell them to the market!

(2) Purchase and upgrade feed to increase your farm's productivity.
Doing this will unlock rare breeds of pig too!

(3) Discover more breeds by mating pigs once per day.
This can get you bonus boosts!

RICH LORE AND STORY
- Every breed has a back story. Be sure to catch 'em all!
- Enjoy the game change from day to night, with different visuals and music too.
- Collaborate and compete with friends with rich social features like in-game chat.

Brought to you by the eccentric minds at Eagle Co., Ltd from Tokyo Japan!

title: Music Piano 7: Rush Song Games
summary:
ğŸµ Why Music Piano 7? ğŸµ

Searching for a piano game packed with your favorite trending songs? Look no further! Music Piano 7 perfectly blends the relaxation of a music game with the excitement of a piano Tile challenge. Step into a musical paradise with genres like Pop, Classic Piano, T-pop, K-pop, J-pop, EDM, Hip-Hop, and R&B.

ğŸ¹ How to Play
Create beautiful melodies by mastering simple yet engaging mechanics:

1. Feel the Beat: Tap the white or black tiles to listen the song.
2. Hold the Rhythm: Press and hold long tiles for continuous melody.
3. Donâ€™t Miss: Keep tapping the Magic tile perfectly for high stars and smooth rhythm!

ğŸŒŸ Features Youâ€™ll Love

1. New Songs Weekly: Keep up with trending hits added regularly.
2. Endless Mode: Push your music and reflex skills to the limit!
3. Exciting Updates: PVP and offline modes are coming soon.

ğŸµ Whatâ€™s New in Music Piano 7?

1. Christmas Challenge: Celebrate the season with fresh, festive songs.
2. Extreme Modes: Test your reflexes with fast tempos and tough levels.
3. Global Leaderboards: Compete against players worldwide and claim the top spot!
4. More Star: Play trending hits from artists like Rose and more!

ğŸ¶ Why Music Piano 7?

1. Itâ€™s a relaxing yet challenging music game, perfect for any Magic for relax.
2. Simple to play but hard to master, ideal for testing hand-speed and reflexes.
3. Combines beautiful melody with engaging gameplay for endless fun.

Tap the tiles, follow the rhythm, and unlock a world of music and magic. Whether you're playing piano classics or vibing to trending hits, Music Piano 7 has something for everyone.

title: Whiteout Survival
summary:
A global chill-out with 300 million players â€“ featuring Howie Mandel!

The blizzard has reset the world, and now, a new story awaits your touch!
As a rising survivor, gather your crew and team up with the free SSR hero Molly.
Together, you'll set out on a joyful adventure, spark the fire of hope, and rebuild a cozy home on the frozen frontier!

[Game Features]
â—†Rebuild & Restore: Easy Progress
Warmth begins with a single spark. Fire up the furnace to melt the snow and reclaim the land! Manage your people and resources to build a bustling, welcoming town!

â—†Idle & Earn: Constant Rewards
Send your heroes out with one tap, then come back to a pile of resources ready for your next big upgrade, all stress-free.

â—†Tap & Play: Instant Fun
Go ice fishing for rare catches or uncover hidden treasures beneath the snow. Perfect for quick, fun sessions anytime!

â—†Plan & Pair: Heroic Combos
All heroes share the same level, so you can upgrade and swap without the grind. Mix and match their skills for ultimate combos!

â—†Unite & Triumph: Shared Success
Join an alliance to heal faster, grow stronger, and explore further. Together, we share the chill and the cheer!

Ready to thrive in the frost? Download Whiteout Survival now â€” a perfect survival experience blending teamwork, idle fun, and smart strategy!

title: Last Z: Survival Shooter
summary:
In an apocalyptic world overrun by the undead, where the fate of humanity hangs in the balance amid diminishing living spaces, will you rise as the hero we need to reshape the destiny of humankind? Uncover the adventure of Last Z: Survival Shooter â€“ your destiny awaits!

Dodge & Shoot
In the heart of the zombie-infested apocalypse, survival is not just a choice but an exhilarating stage, challenging the prowess of dodging and shooting skills. Navigate through waves of relentless undead, strategically evading their onslaught while honing your precision shooting. Each dodge and shoot propel you closer to victory, earning you abundant rewards in this thrilling game of wits and reflexes.

Explore & Expand
Brace yourself for an adrenaline-fueled journey where the apocalypse is your playground for exploration and expansion. Explore abandoned areas, uncover hidden treasures, grow from epic battles, and forge bonds with reliable companions who accompany you through thick and thin. Every step of the way brings you closer to establishing your own doomsday shelter.


Survive & Thrive
In Last Z: Survival Shooter, survival marks merely the starting point as you endeavor not just to survive but to thrive amid impending annihilation. Through exploration, expansion, and evolution, the world transforms into a vast canvas of growth and opportunity. Your prowess ascends across economic, technological, and military realms, unlocking boundless potential. And your burgeoning shelter will ultimately emerge as a beacon of hope for human civilization.

Explore, thrive, and redefine the meaning of survival in this gripping saga. Download Last Z: Survival Shooter now, plunge into the ultimate test of survival, and unveil the depths of your courage to conquer the apocalypse!

title: Pixel Flow!
summary:
Conveyorâ€™s ready, pigs are on standby. Tap to send a pig onto the conveyor so it rains balls onto pixel cubes of its own color. The number above its head is its ammo: thatâ€™s how many hits it makes. Run out and it leaves the stage; if not, it slips into one of the 5 waiting slots and, when you tap again, it jumps back on the conveyor to fire another round.
The conveyor has a capacityâ€”push past the limit and youâ€™ll need to wait. Send them in the right order, manage the flow, and hit the cubes to clear the board piece by piece. Simple mechanic, sticky loop: tap â†’ flow â†’ repeat.
Highlights
One-tap control: Quick sessions, easy one-handed play.
Color matching: Pigs only hit their own colorâ€”no target-picking hassle.
Conveyor capacity: Timing and queue management add a bite-size strategy layer.
5 waiting slots: Stack, sort, and launch at the perfect moment.
Short but â€œone more roundâ€ feel: Perfect for micro-breaks.
Satisfying pixel cleanup: Every hit leaves the board feeling crisp.
For anyone who loves fast action-puzzles, timing, and flow management. The pigs are ready. The cubesâ€¦ not so much.

title: Sled Surfers
summary:
Dive into the ultimate winter adventure with Sled Surfers! Become a true snow rider as you slide through icy slopes, dodge obstacles, and race across a magical frost world filled with action. Glide on your sledge, surf the snow, and enjoy fast-paced challenges inspired by the fun, simple unpredictability.
Race through snowy trails, master tight turns, and unlock cool winter gear as you explore frozen forests, icy cliffs, and slippery downhill tracks. Whether you're chasing the thrill of a snow race or simply enjoying a relaxing winter glide, every run is packed with excitement.
And if you love the summer chaos of aqua park or waterpark slide games, youâ€™ll enjoy the same smooth, addictive flowâ€”just with a frosty twist!

title: Paper.io 2
summary:
Welcome to the next level of addictive and thrilling gameplay with Paper.io 2! Enter a colorful and dynamic world where strategy, skill, and cunning are your greatest allies. Prepare to embark on an epic journey of conquest as you strive to dominate the virtual realm and become the ultimate champion!

Paper.io 2 builds upon the success of its predecessor, delivering an even more exhilarating multiplayer experience that will keep you hooked for hours on end. Join millions of players from around the globe in real-time battles where every move counts. Are you ready to claim your place at the top of the leaderboard?

ğŸ° Conquer Territory: Expand your territory and assert your dominance over the battlefield. Strategize your moves to outmaneuver opponents and capture as much space as possible. But beware, as rivals will stop at nothing to thwart your plans!

ğŸŒ Global Domination: Compete against players worldwide in intense multiplayer matches. Test your skills against the best and rise through the ranks to become the ultimate ruler of Paper.io 2. Will you emerge victorious?

ğŸ’¥ Power-Up Arsenal: Gain the upper hand in battle with a variety of powerful abilities and enhancements. From speed boosts to defensive shields, choose your power-ups wisely to gain a strategic advantage over your adversaries.

ğŸ¤– AI Challenges: Not in the mood for multiplayer? Take on challenging AI opponents in solo mode and hone your skills to perfection. Can you beat the computer and prove your mastery of the game?

ğŸ¨ Customization: Express yourself with skins, themes, and avatars to choose from. Whether you're a fierce warrior or a playful prankster, there's a look for every style. Show off your personality and stand out from the crowd!

ğŸ† Achievements and Rewards: Unlock achievements and earn rewards as you progress through the game. From exclusive skins to in-game currency, there are plenty of incentives to keep you coming back for more.

ğŸ® Easy to Learn, Hard to Master: With simple controls and addictive gameplay, Paper.io 2 is easy to pick up for players of all skill levels. However, mastering the art of territory conquest will require cunning strategy and razor-sharp reflexes.

ğŸ‰ Endless Entertainment: With dynamic gameplay and endless possibilities, there's never a dull moment in Paper.io 2. From epic battles to hilarious mishaps, you'll be laughing, cheering, and rolling your way to victory!

ğŸ‘‘ Become the Legend: Rise from a mere contender to a legendary champion as you conquer more territory and outsmart your opponents. Leave your mark on the virtual world of Paper.io 2 and etch your name into the annals of history.

Join the millions of players already hooked on Paper.io 2 and experience the thrill of conquest like never before. Whether you're a casual gamer looking for some quick fun or a competitive strategist seeking a challenge, Paper.io 2 offers something for everyone. Download now and embark on your quest for domination!

title: Watermelon Maker 2048
summary:
Dive into the exciting and exciting world of fruit merging!
Merge the same fruits to make a bigger fruit.

If the fruit overflows the container, it's game over!
Be careful! The more fruits you merge, the bigger they become and can overflow the container.
You can compete with users from all over the world and compete for rankings through the multiplayer battle mode!

[How to play]
Aim to where you want the fruit to drop.
Merge fruits of the same stage to make a bigger fruit.
The more fruits you merge, the higher your score.
Merge watermelons in the final stage to make them disappear with additional scores.

[Features]
- Play anywhere with one hand.
- Play offline.
- Easy to operate and simple rules
- Play multiplayer battles with users from all over the world.
- Compete for rankings with users from all over the world every week!
- Collect various skins.
- Supports tablet play.

[Various Skins]
- You can change each of the 11 skins.
- If you merge sweet fruits, it becomes a watermelon.
- If you merge cute animals, it becomes an elephant.
- If you merge large planets, it becomes the sun.
- If you merge delicious foods, it becomes a pizza.
- If you collect skins, you can receive special rewards.
- Unlike other merge puzzle games, it is a game that anyone can easily enjoy!
- Start the fruit merge game that is popular around the world now!

title: Jigsolitaire
summary:
Combine the photos on the cards correctly to complete a single picture. Once you experience the satisfying snap of the cards fitting perfectly, you'll be hooked for sure!

[Game Features]
- Enjoy Completing Photos by Combining Cards
Even if the cards seem random at first, finding the exact spot they fit brings unmatched satisfaction!

- Intuitive Swipe Controls
Simply swipe to move the cards. When cards stick together, you can move them as a group, making gameplay smooth and easy.

- Exhilarating Chain Reactions
The thrill of multiple cards locking into place all at once is seriously addictive. This is a puzzle game with high replay value.

- Designed for All Skill Levels
Whether you have a bit of free time or want a longer play session, this game is perfect. You'll find new discoveries each time you play!

- Wide Variety of Themed Photos
From flowers and landscapes to animals, we plan to continuously add a diverse range of photos!

[How to Play]
- Swipe to Move Cards
Swipe your screen to drag the cards wherever you like.

- Move Connected Cards All at Once
When cards are placed correctly, they snap together. You can then move the connected group of cards as a single unit.

- Caution When Overlapping Large and Small Cards
If you place a small card on top of a larger one, the larger card may shrink. Pay close attention to any size changes and combine them carefully.

Despite its simple controls, "Jigsolitaire" offers depth through strategic card placement. Whether you love jigsaw puzzles, enjoy solitaire, or just want a fun and easy puzzle, give it a try!

title: Township
summary:
BUILD YOUR DREAM TOWN!

Welcome to Township, a thrilling city-building and farming game where you become the mayor of your own town!
Build houses, factories, and community buildings, grow crops on your farm, and decorate your town just the way you like. Take part in limited-time events, compete in exciting regattas, and earn exclusive prizes!

Need a break from city planning? Jump into relaxing match-3 puzzles to earn rewards, speed up your progress, and unlock even more fun â€” all available offline!
Township â€” the perfect blend of city-building, farming, and match-3 gameplay!

â— Exclusive collections: Gather valuable artifacts, rare antiquities, and colorful profile pictures to showcase your achievements!
â— Offline play: Enjoy Township anytime, anywhere â€” even without an internet connection!
â— Vibrant community: Meet friendly characters with unique personalities!

Why You'll Love Township:
â— A unique mix of city-building, farming, and match-3 gameplay!
â— Stunning graphics and charming animations
â— Regular updates with fresh content and special events

title: Ball Run 2048: merge number
summary:
This is a ball game where you have to make the numbers on the balls bigger.

Control the balls with your finger to make them merge with other balls of the same number!
Each time the balls are combined, they get bigger and change color.
The number on the ball starts from 2, when it merges with a ball of the same number, the numbers are added and grows up to a maximum of 2048.
Even children can complete the game, but it is very difficult to reach the goal at 2048.

Control the balls so it does not fall off the course or hit obstacles and try to reach 2048!
Can you make a rainbow-colored 2048 ball?

Rules Description:
Swipe to move the ball.
When you hit a ball with the same number on it as the ball you are controlling, the number will increase.
The numbers on the balls increase from 2-4-8-16-32-64-128-256-512-1024-2048.
If the ball fall off the rail, you will restart from the beginning.
If you get stuck on a thorn, your number will decrease.
The higher the number of balls, the greater the reward at the goal.

title: Tile Match puzzle - Tiletopia
summary:
Introducing "Tile Match" â€“ the captivating tile-matching puzzle game that will immerse you in a world of triple tile-tapping challenges and brain-teasing fun.


Get ready to embark on an exciting journey through intricate puzzles as you match tiles, clear boards, and become the ultimate tile master.

With its friendly mechanics and addictive gameplay, Tile Match is the perfect choice for tile-matching enthusiasts who crave a delightful puzzle gaming experience.

In Tile Match, your objective is simple yet engaging: match three or more tiles to clear them from the board. What starts as a straightforward game quickly evolves into a thrilling mental workout as you progress through increasingly intricate levels. The game takes inspiration from classic Mahjong puzzles and elevates them with modern graphics and a touch of innovation, making Tile Match a classic matching game for players of all ages.
Key Features of Tile Match:

1. Addictive Matching Gameplay: Dive into the world of triple tile matching with easy-to-learn mechanics that quickly become addictive. The more you play, the more challenging it gets, ensuring you're always engaged.

2. Beautifully Crafted 3D Tiles: Tile Match boasts stunning 3D tiles that not only enhance the visual appeal but also provide a delightful sensory experience as you tap tiles and match your way through the game.

3. Brain-Teasing Challenges: Each level in Tile Match presents a new and exciting puzzle to solve. It's not just about matching tiles; it's about strategy and skill as you navigate through brain-teasers that will keep you on your toes.

4. Unlock Scenic Landscapes: Traverse a mesmerizing game world filled with scenic landscapes and interesting tiles as you progress through the levels. From serene seascapes to lush rainforests, Tile Match offers a visually diverse gaming experience.

5. Endless Entertainment: With thousands of challenging puzzles, brainteasers, and classic tile-matching games at your fingertips, you'll never run out of opportunities to test your tile-matching prowess.

6. Regular Game Updates: Stay excited and engaged with Tile Match, as new levels are added regularly to keep the gameplay fresh and invigorating.

7. Master the Art of Matching: Clear the tile game board by matching three tiles and unlock new triple tile match chapters, each with its unique set of challenges and scenic backdrops.

8. For Gamers of All Levels: Whether you're a casual gamer looking for a relaxing pastime or a hardcore enthusiast seeking a formidable challenge, Tile Match caters to a wide range of players.

In conclusion, Tile Match is a must-have for anyone who appreciates the thrill of triple tile-matching puzzles. With its beautiful 3D tiles, regular updates, and a vast array of brain-teasing levels, it promises hours of entertainment.

Download Tile Match today and embark on a journey to become the ultimate tile master. Tap, match, and conquer the world of tiles in this exciting puzzle adventure!

title: Number Master: Run and merge
summary:
Make big numbers to reach the goal!

You can move your numbers by swiping.
You can absorb numbers on the stage that are smaller than yours when you hit them.
But if you bump into a number larger than you, you lose the number and have to start over.

Avoid electric saws, cross bridges, and jump ditches to reach the goal.

At the goal, many walls are waiting for you.
Break the walls one by one with big numbers and see the world beyond the goal!

title: Tanghulu Master - Mukbang ASMR
summary:
Create and crunch away at your candied Tanghulu masterpiece!

Lulu's family, once the masters of Tanghulu, face a rising challenge as more Tanghulu shops pop up and steal customers away. Embark on the journey with Lulu as she aims to restore her family's shop through the world of Mukbang ASMR and become a true master of Tanghulu!

"Let's start today's Tanghulu live stream!"

[Stacking ingredients]
Surviving as a Mukbang creator is tough, so get creative - add marshmallows, gummy bears and even chili peppers to your Tanghulu creations!

[Sugar Coating]
Once you've filled up your skewer, pop them in the pot and give a gentle stir to give a delicious sugary glaze. Create a thin and crunchy Tanghulu with the master's secret technique!

[Mukbang Live Stream]
Yet another crunchy live stream success! Yum! The chat was buzzing today. Now it's time to stock up on fresh ingredients with the Super Chats I earned by completing viewer missions!

Are you ready? It's time to challenge the Tanghulu master!

Contact: support@whoyaho.com

title: CatDog World: After Humans
summary:
Rise as a dominator and lead your partner to revive the glory of legends!

A blazing catastrophe has struck, bringing a severe water shortage. Many animals have turned into mindless thugs. After several upheavals, the Kingdom of Akron is experiencing dwindling food supplies and harsh living conditions. The frequent extreme heat waves are pushing animals to the edge of survival.

To overcome the crisis, building a new home is imperative. In this world where humans have vanished, you will take on the responsibility of the shelter chief, leading your animal companions to find a place of hope. Build, develop, and expand the shelter, ultimately rising as the king of this new world.

[Game Features]

Shelter Construction:
Establish your own animal home with interesting buildings.

Micro World:
This is a brand-new world. Come explore its mysteries!

Partner Recruitment:
Friendly Labradors, quirky Leopard Geckos, cool Devon Rex, and playful British Shorthair all want to be your friends. Recruit more helpers to expand your team and boost your strength. You'll also gain the best companions!

Animal Survival Challenge:
Craft survival strategies in a resource-scarce environment and battle other families for limited supplies.

[Strategy Gameplay]

Management Simulation:
Expand your territory and develop the shelter; tackle survival crises and withstand heat waves; enact chief decrees and enjoy party time; strategize distribution and enhance animal productivity.

Expel Beasts:
California condors, mandrills, and American black bears are threatening the Kingdom of Akron. They possess destructive power, so quickly unite with your allies to vanquish these wild beasts.

Form Alliance:
Don't face the unknown dangers of the kingdom alone. Create or join an alliance, and conquer the battlefield with allies to capture the Central Square!

Assemble Partners:
Find and unite with millions of extraordinary players to collectively face severe environmental challenges. Uncover the secrets behind natural calamities and save the world plagued by heat waves.

Path of Legends:
Pursue the path of legends, discover hidden clues and treasures in the relics, compete with other families for the central square, and become the rightful dominator, creating a new legend for the kingdom!

Precious Resources:
As legends fade and stars fall, numerous powerful stellar crystals have appeared on the continent. These crystals draw the greedy eyes of other families and thugsâ€¦. Since conflict is inevitable, letâ€™s overcome all challenges and fight for the crystals!

Having problems in the game? We're here to help with any game-related issues! Contact us via the in-game customer service center or the following channel!
Official Community:
https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61564956697814

Discordï¼šhttps://discord.gg/h8sd4pd6

title: Aqua Romance: Sort Journey
summary:
Dive into a relaxing, aquatic-themed puzzle adventure with Aqua Romance: Sort Journey! This soothing yet challenging game combines sorting mechanics with a heartwarming love story set in the tranquil waters of a mysterious underwater world. Help our charming protagonist navigate through an array of colorful, aquatic objects, solving puzzles and discovering secrets hidden deep within the oceanâ€™s depths.

In Aqua Romance: Sort Journey, your goal is simple: sort items like seashells, pearls, and water creatures into their correct containers. As you progress through hundreds of unique levels, youâ€™ll unlock romantic storylines, encounter intriguing characters, and experience the beauty of the underwater world.

title: Mob Control
summary:
ğŸŒŸ Lead, Multiply, and Conquer! Mob Control delivers thrilling tower defense action where you grow your mob, deploy powerful champions, and crush enemy bases. Unlock collectible cards, conquer exciting modes, and climb the Champions League. Face new challenges, earn rewards, and discover fresh content as you rise to tower defense supremacy!

ğŸ° Unleash Your Inner Commander in Mob Control: The Ultimate Tower Defense Clash!

ğŸ† Defend, Conquer, and Rise to Victory in this Epic Tower Defense Showdown!

Are you ready to become the ultimate champion in the world of tower defense battles? Mob Control brings you an unparalleled strategy and action-packed experience that will test your skills, wit, and tactical prowess. With oddly satisfying gameplay and a wide array of features, Mob Control is your gateway to tower defense supremacy.

Oddly Satisfying Gameplay: Create, Grow, and Lead!

Experience the strangely satisfying thrill of watching your mob multiply as you aim and shoot at the gates. Witness your army grow to massive proportions!
Strategically deploy your mighty Champions to break through enemy mobs and reach their bases. Choose the best combo for victory!
Explore intriguing level elements like speed boosts, multipliers, moving gates, and more, adding depth and challenge to your gameplay.

Become an Immortal Player: Rise Through the Ranks!

Earn Championship Stars by emerging victorious in battles, fortifying your bases, and dominating tournaments. Show the world your tower defense prowess!

Climb the prestigious Champions League using your hard-earned Championship Stars and become an immortal player, joining the elite few who have conquered this tower defense realm.

Fortify Your Base: Shield Your Dominion!

Secure your base from enemy raids by winning battles and earning valuable shields. Protect your hard-earned resources and maintain your tower defense dominance.

Unlock and Upgrade Cards: Collect, Evolve, and Dominate!

Win battles to unlock booster packs of varying rarities and enhance your card collection. Collectible cards hold the power to elevate your tower defense strategy to new heights.

Unlock all the Cannons, Mobs and Champions in the armory and discover their amazing evolutions as you level them up.

Diverse Game Modes: Challenge and Conquer!

Engage in thrilling game modes that keep the action fresh:
Base Invasion: Raid enemy strongholds, pilfer coins, and claim bricks from rival players. Plunder and dominate!

Revenge and Counter-Attack: Turn the tables on attackers and seek retribution against those who challenge your tower defense might.

Boss Levels: Test your tower defense mettle in unique level layouts, earning extra bonuses as you conquer the most challenging adversaries.

Season Pass: A Constant Stream of Fresh Content!

Dive into ever-evolving content with our monthly Season Pass.
Complete quests, advance tiers, and unlock new heroes, cannons and skins

Always Improving: Join the Evolution!

Our dedicated team is committed to delivering fresh mechanics and content every month. Stay connected and share your ideas via Settings > Discord, actively contributing to the evolution of Mob Control.

A Premium Experience: Your Choice to Play Ad-Free!

Mob Control is free to download and utilizes ads to support ongoing development. Opt for the Premium Pass or a permanent no-ads package to enjoy uninterrupted tower defense action.
Speed up your progress and reap extra rewards without watching ads, thanks to Skipâ€™Its.

Support and Privacy: Your Satisfaction Matters! Connect with us in-game via Settings > Help and Support whenever you need assistance or have questions. Your privacy is crucial to us. Review our comprehensive privacy policy at https://www.voodoo.io/privacy

Join the tower defense clash like never before with Mob Control! Rally your army, harness the power of collectible cards, and become the tower defense champion you were born to be. Download now and embark on your journey to tower defense glory!

title: Going Balls
summary:
Going Balls: The Ultimate Speed and Balance Challenge! ğŸš€

Are you ready for a high-speed runner game that tests your reflexes and mastery of physics? Download Going Balls today and experience the most thrilling arcade adventure on mobile! Join millions of players worldwide in this addictive hyper-casual hit.

What is Going Balls? âš½ï¸ğŸƒâ€â™‚ï¸

Going Balls is an exhilarating, fast-paced ball game where your main goal is to control a rolling ball and guide it safely to the finish line on increasingly difficult tracks. Itâ€™s the perfect blend of a precision puzzle game and a heart-pounding speed challenge.

How to Play:
Swipe your screen to control the speed and direction of your ball. Master the art of balance as you navigate narrow paths, dodge unexpected obstacles (challenge!), and collect coins ğŸ’° to unlock new balls and environments.
The simple controls hide a deep, skill-based arcade experience!

Key Features: The Ultimate Rolling Adventure! ğŸš§

* Dozens of Challenging Levels: Race through diverse worlds, from sky-high platforms to treacherous industrial zones. Each level offers a unique challenge that will keep you coming back for more!
* Realistic Physics Engine: Feel the thrill of true physics-based gameplay. Every roll, jump, and acceleration feels incredibly smooth and responsive. Balance is key to surviving!
* Customize Your Ball: Collect thousands of coins and unlock a massive collection of cool, colorful, and unique balls. Personalize your runner experience! ğŸ¨
* Intuitive One-Finger Control: The ultimate pick-up-and-play hyper-casual design. Simple to learn, but incredibly hard to master - perfect for quick bursts of fun or long endless sessions.
* Tons of Obstacles: Avoid swinging hammers, tricky ramps, massive wrecking balls, and unexpected gaps. Your speed and precision are your only allies!

Why You'll Love Going Balls! ğŸ‰

Going Balls is more than just a runner - it's an immensely satisfying experience. The rush of barely making a jump, the joy of collecting a huge stack of coins, and the feeling of accomplishment after conquering a nearly impossible challenge makes this game highly addictive.

Weâ€™ve optimized the gameplay for pure fun!
* Instant Thrills: Short, intense levels make it ideal for quick breaks.
Skill Progression: You can feel yourself getting better at speed and balance with every attempt.
* High Replayability: The pursuit of the perfect, flawless run is endless!

Download Now - Totally FREE! ğŸ’¯

Ready to roll? Get the full arcade experience without spending a dime!
Going Balls is totally free to download and play. Experience the ultimate physics-based challenge today!

title: Gear Defenders
summary:
Gear Defenders â€“ A Revolutionary Placement-Adventure Game: Build Your Tactical Fortress, One Gear at a Time
Tired of strategy games that demand endless grind? Meet Gear Defenders â€“ a fresh blend of "idle collection" and "strategic adventure" that lets you effortlessly generate powerful troops with simple taps, assembling your very own war machine block by block.
ã€Craft Your War Engine Like a Puzzleã€‘
Place soldiers around the Power Core, and watch them work like magic to continuously spawn combat units. From basic infantry to elite knights, every troop is a "gear" in your fortress â€“ drag, drop, and strategize to build the ultimate defense lineï¼
ã€Unlock 10+ Troop Typesã€‘
On your adventure, youâ€™ll unlock over 10 unique soldier types: resilient infantry, long-range archers, shield bearers, and even legendary magic knightsâ€¦ Each troop boasts distinct skills and upgrade paths. Level up, enhance, evolve â€“ transform ordinary squads into elite forces, and watch your fortressâ€™s power soar to take on tougher foes.
ã€100+ Challenging Levelsã€‘
Over 100 meticulously designed levels pit you against tricky enemies: goblins with cunning traps, mummies cursed with dark magic, yetis raging with brute strengthâ€¦ Each enemy faction wields unique attack patterns, while battlefields range from narrow canyons to sprawling plains.Every troop combination could be your winning move.
Whether youâ€™re a casual player craving relaxed placement or a hardcore strategist obsessed with tactical depth, Gear Defenders has something for you. Build your war machine with a flick of your finger, witness the growth of your forces from tiny to formidable, and embark on your gear-driven adventure today â€“ download now!

title: Wizardry Variants Daphne
summary:
Wizardry Variants Daphne carries on the lineage of the classic RPG series, Wizardry. The portal to the labyrinth of despair, where even destruction is pleasure, has opened once again.

â–  Story
Once every 100 years, the Abyss opens.

It is a curse of death that consumes the continent. A Warlock who coveted Death, devoured people and animals and enveloped the world in despair.

Inheriting the power to seal the Abyss over generations, kings have continued to protect the kingdom from its curse.

But now, the king has vanished, and the world is being consumed by death, moment by moment.

Resistance itself is meaningless.
There is naught but to perish.

â–  Adventure with allies
Experience an adventure of your very own with unique allies based on combinations of classes and races.

â–  Difficulty with a bite
Perilous traps and mighty foes await in the dungeon. Take on a high difficulty that only Wizardry can offer.

â–  Intuitive Controls
Play a full 3D dungeon anytime, anywhere, with one hand on your upright smartphone.

â–  Cadre of renowned creators
Main Character Design: Yusuke Kozaki
Manga artist and illustrator; in addition to writing manga, he also does design work for anime and games, and is well known for the fine touches in his character designs.

Boss Monster Design: Katsuya Terada
His work, centered on manga and illustration, includes character designs video games and movies, as well as poster for theater productions.

Sound: Hitoshi Sakimoto
Has composed for more than 130 game titles of all genres. With their rich sound and epic scale, his scores have received tremendous support not only in Japan, but also from overseas.

â–  Magnificent cast brings the fully-voiced scenario to life
[English Voice Actors]
Lulunarde: Morgan Cambs
Pulgritte: Dev Joshi
Dylanhardt: Doug Cockle
Elmon: Laurence Bouvard
Vernant: Christopher Ragland
Pickerel: Alex Capon
Leaufonde: Garrick Hagon
Shagtis of Sorrow: Jay Rincon

- Other Voice Actors, etc. -

[Japanese Voice Actors]

Dylanhardt: Chikahiro Kobayashi

- Other Voice Actors, etc. -
Yutaka Aoyama, Masumi Asano, Koji Ishii, Maaya Uchida, Yu Kobayashi, Tetsuo Komura, Jiro Saito, Yu Shimamura, Yoko Soumi, Shinya Takahashi, Hiroki Takahashi, Yumi Toma, Yuichi Nakamura, Romi Park, Fairouz Ai, Shinshu Fuji, Takanori Hoshino, Anna Yamaki, Aoi Yuki -- Other appearances (in Japanese alphabetical order)

â– What is Wizardry?
Wizardry is a computer role-playing game released in the United States in 1981 with elements such as party organizing, labyrinth exploration, monster fighting, and character development having such a tremendous impact on the various RPGs that followed, that it is often referred to as the origin of RPGs. Numerous sequels have been released, and nearly 40 years after its release, it remains a timeless masterpiece that enjoys strong popularity around the world.

title: Offline Games - No Wifi Games
summary:
Get ready for 'Offline Games': fun for all ages, and a mental workout too! This offline game collection is like an overflowing toy box packed with more than 20 unique minigames. It's designed for classic game enthusiasts, puzzle lovers, and challenge seekers. And the best part? You don't need an internet connection to enjoy it!

Our array of Number Games like 2048 and 2248 will get your neurons firing. Engage in these numeric challenges and strive to hit the highest scores. They're perfect for keeping your mind sharp, and they're addictive, too! You'll find yourself coming back to beat your own scores time and again.
Word Games are a great way to expand your vocabulary and language skills. With word guess and word finder, you'll embark on an adventure through a maze of letters, uncovering hidden words, and building your own word lists. It's a fun way to learn new words, and the challenge will keep you hooked for hours.

Feel the adrenaline rush with our Thrilling Challenges. Step into the mind-bending world of Minesweeper, where every click could be your last. Or play Hangman, where you'll rack your brains to guess the right letters before time runs out.

We've brought back some of your favorite Classic Memory Games. Engage your brain in our sound memory game, a modern twist on the classic 'Simon Says'. For a bit of nostalgia, we've also included the much-loved game of Snake.

For the serious strategists and thinkers out there, our Mind Benders section is perfect. Chess and Chess puzzles will provide a mental workout and fun brain training. Hone your strategic skills, and take on the challenge to become the grandmaster.

Our Two-Player Games offer the perfect opportunity for a friendly showdown. Go head-to-head with AI in games like Checkers, Pool, or Tic Tac Toe, even when you're in airplane mode. It's fun gaming action whenever you want, wherever you are! See if your friends can do better!

Our collection includes brain-stimulating games like Tap Match, Solitaire, Sudoku, Wood Blocks, 4 in a row, and the Sliding Puzzle in our Keep Them Thinking section. These games are designed to keep your mind sharp and focused, and they're also a lot of fun.

Ever wanted to try your hand at an exotic game? Now you can, right from your device, with Mancala in our Exotic Games section.

'Offline Games' is a fantastic app for all ages - kids, teens, adults, and even seniors. It offers a fun, engaging, and stimulating gaming experience without the need for an internet connection. Whether you're on a long journey, stuck at home, or in the middle of a flight, you're never far from the action with 'Offline Games'. It's the perfect app to challenge yourself, pass the time, and have loads of fun.

Remember, with 'Offline Games', you don't need an internet connection to play. You can enjoy your favorite games anytime, anywhere. Say goodbye to those dull moments and welcome endless entertainment with 'Offline Games'. Who knew having fun could be this easy? Jump in and start playing today!

title: Shadowverse: Worlds Beyond
summary:
Shadowverse: Worlds Beyond is a brand-new strategy card game from the popular Shadowverse CCG.
Enjoy creating decks and battling online, just like the original Shadowverse CCG.
With the newly added super-evolution mechanic and Shadowverse Park, among other brand-new content, there is lots to enjoy for both seasoned and brand-new players.

Card Battles
The rules of Shadowverse are simple, yet offer limitless ways to strategize and win.
Use different card combinations to create unique synergies and strategies in battles against players all around the world.
Dive into the game and enjoy strategic card battles with breathtaking graphics and effects.

New Game Mechanic: Super-Evolution
Each of your followers (unit cards you play on the field) can now super-evolve!
Followers that have super-evolved are stronger and can knock opposing followers out with powerful attacks and deal damage straight to their leader!Â 
Super-evolve your followers and enjoy exhilarating card battles like never before!

Free Card Pack Every Day
Log in to open a free card pack every day!
Collect cards for the new compendium feature!
Enjoy battling and collecting!

Class
Choose from 7 unique classes that match your playstyle and create custom decks.
Tailor your deck to match your strategy and style, then dive into epic card battles!

Story
Experience a brand new Shadowverse story where characters are brought to life with full voice acting!
Follow spectacular stories centered around seven unique characters, each bringing their own personality to the adventure.

New Feature: Shadowverse Park
Step into the Shadowverse CCG community where players can connect and interact!
Show off your avatar with customizable outfits and emotes, bond with others, and grow stronger together!

Shadowverse: Worlds Beyond is recommended to the following:
- Fans of card games and collecting cards
- Players who like collectible card games (CCG) or trading card games (TCG)
- Long-time fans and players of the Shadowverse CCG
- Players who enjoy PvP card games
- People who have played other TCG and CCG before
- Players who are looking for new TCG and CCG
- Fans of strategic trading card games (TCG) and collectible card games (CCG)
- Players who are looking for card games with compelling full-scale stories
- Card collectors who appreciate beautifully designed collectible or trading cards
- People who want to connect and interact with others through gaming

title: Daily Number Match
summary:
Daily Number Match is a fun and addictive number-matching game. Match the numbers and clear the board. Sharpen your mind, enjoy some fun, and improve your math skills at the same time! ğŸ”¢ Thousands of number puzzles are waiting for you!

How to Play
-Find pairs with the same value or sum of 10.
-Check row by row. Remember pairs can be vertical, horizontal, or diagonal.
-Scan left to right going from one row to another. Pay attention to the pairs from the end of one row and the beginning of another. As long as there is no number between them, they can be eliminated!
-Clear one row to shift up the remaining numbers and build new pairs
-When there is no pair left, click on "+" to copy the remaining numbers and build more pairs
-The ultimate goal is to clear the board and go as far as you can.

Features:
-Simple Gameplay: Just tap the numbers and eliminate them all!
-Endless Fun: Over 10000+ stages are waiting for you.
-Minimalistic Design: A pure number-matching game with no distracting features.
-Sharpen Your Mind: Exercise your brain with challengingÂ Daily Number Match.
-Play Anytime & Anywhere: No time limits! No Wifi needed!

Daily Number Match is a challenging puzzle game designed to meet all your expectations. ğŸ’¯ If you are a math puzzle fan looking for a pure math puzzle game without annoying features, then Daily Number Match is definitely for you! ğŸ¯

If you are overwhelmed by your daily life, let Daily Number Match energize you to train your brain and relax your mind. Stop waiting! Download now and enjoy endless fun!

title: West Game II
summary:
Welcome to West Game II, where the rugged spirit of the American Frontier comes to life in your quest to build a thriving town amid the chaos of the Wild West. As the leader of an emerging settlement in post-Civil War America, you will rescue townsfolk, build a formidable gang, and carve your name into the annals of Western history.

In 1865, the Civil War had ended, but the struggle for survival in the lawless West had just begun. Dreamers and fortune-seekers flood the Frontier, each fighting for their share of glory and gold. In this ruthless land where deception and betrayal are common currency, your leadership and strategic prowess will determine whether your town flourishes or falls.

West Game II is a game of ambition, strategy, and cunning. Every decision shapes your town's destiny and your reputation in the Wild West. Will you focus on developing a prosperous economy through your loyal townsfolk, or will you build an unstoppable force of outlaws and gunslingers? The frontier awaits your commandâ€”do you have what it takes to become a legend of the West?

GAME FEATURES

Rescue and Take in Townsfolk:Â Defeat Rebels and rescue refugees throughout the dangerous frontier. Convert these grateful survivors into loyal Townsfolk who will help your settlement grow and prosper.

Dynamic Town Building:Â Construct and upgrade a variety of Western buildings to create a thriving frontier settlement that reflects your vision of the ideal Western community.

Recruit Powerful Heroes:Â Recruit infamous Heroes and Outlaws to fight under your banner. Promote and equip them with legendary equipment to create an unstoppable force.

Epic Real-Time Battles:Â Lead your Sheriff and Heroes into battle against rebels, rival players, and anyone who dares challenge your authority. Experience the thrill of combat as you expand your territory across the Wild West.

Forge Formidable Alliances:Â Team up with other players to create powerful coalitions. Share resources, coordinate attacks, and defend each other's territories against common enemies.

SPECIAL NOTES

Â· Network connection is required.
Â· Privacy Policy: https://www.leyinetwork.com/en/privacy/
Â· Terms of Use: https://www.leyinetwork.com/en/privacy/terms_of_use

title: Hello Kitty My Dream Store

title: Wool Crushâ„¢ - Yarn Color Sort
summary:
Wool Crush â€“ Logic Color Sort Puzzle Master

Sharpen your mind and test your logic in Wool Crush - 3D Wool Sort, a color sort puzzle game designed for relaxing yet strategic play.
Solve each yarn sort puzzle step by step, match colors with precision, and complete challenging wool sort levels that blend car jam logic and creativity.

ğŸ§© Solve Logic Challenges and Clear Every Puzzle
- Each level in Wool Crush - Car Jam Logic is a handcrafted color sort puzzle with a clear objective: match all wool sort colors in the correct order.
- Think ahead, plan your moves, and use your brain to complete every yarn sort stage efficiently.
- Itâ€™s easy to start, fun to play, and deeply satisfying to master!
- Progress through hundreds of 3D color sort puzzles and discover new yarn sort mechanics as you play.

ğŸ® How to Play Wool Crush - Color Sort:
1. Tap the cannon that matches the dragonâ€™s color in this 3D wool sort adventure.
2. Aim and fire at the right spots to weaken the wool knitting dragon using car jam style logic.
3. Drive the dragons away and keep the cats safe in relaxing yarn sort games!

âœ¨ Game Features â€“ Relaxing Car Jam Logic Puzzle Adventure
ğŸ§  Pure Puzzle Experience: Every stage challenges your color sort logic, sequence recognition, and wool sort strategy planning.
ğŸ® Easy to Play, Hard to Master: Simple one-tap controls make the car jam and yarn sort gameplay relaxing and casual, while advanced wool sort puzzles test your thinking skills.
ğŸŒˆ Color Sorting + Logic Gameplay: A perfect mix of wool sort, yarn sort, and car jam puzzle mechanics â€” plan, match, and solve every color sort challenge!
ğŸ¯ Clear Puzzle Objectives: Each yarn sort level has a specific goal â€” sort all yarns by color, clear the grid, or unlock the next stage.
ğŸ’¡ Smart Progression System: Puzzles evolve with new rules, car jam obstacles, and wool boosters as you advance, keeping your brain engaged.
ğŸŒŸ Casual Relaxation Meets Brain Challenge: Enjoy smooth 3D visuals and calm soundtracks while completing relaxing color sort puzzles.
ğŸ§¶ Rewarding Completion: Finishing each puzzle brings a deep sense of accomplishment and unlocks new yarn sort modes and visual themes.

Step into Wool Crush and experience the joy of logical thinking, color sorting, and satisfying wool sort puzzle-solving.
If you enjoy brain teasers, logic puzzles, or car jam and color sort challenges, Wool Crush is your perfect relaxing puzzle companion!

title: Royal Match
summary:
Welcome to Royal Match, the king of puzzle games! Swipe colors, solve match-3 puzzles and help King Robert decorate his castle. An exciting adventure is calling you!

We have thousands of challenging match-3 levels for you to play in the Royal Arena! On this fun journey, you will solve exciting puzzles, receive coins for unlocking new areas, decorate King Robertâ€™s castle and get extra boosters to continue your saga. Also you can compete with millions of players in events such as King's Cup, Sky Race, Team Battle, Lightning Rush and claim exciting rewards for your achievements. Fun and challenge never ends and you will never have a dull moment in Royal Match.

And BOOM! It is 100% ad free and no wifi needed - internet free.

Jump into the adventure and play now! We have lots of sweet puzzles to enjoy. Each new episode comes with free coins, helpful boosters, surprising awards, challenging tasks and wonderful areas.

- A unique match 3 gameplay and fun levels for both masters and new match 3 players!
- Unlock and blast powerful boosters!
- Collect loads of coins and special treasures in bonus levels!
- Watch out for obstacles on the road such as birds, boxes, potions, cupboards, diamonds, magic hats, coin safes, mysterious mailboxes and piggy!
- Open amazing chests for a chance to win coins, boosters, unlimited life and power-ups!
- Explore the new rooms, royal chambers, splendid gardens, and many more exciting areas in King Robertâ€™s castle!
- Decorate the areas, including the Kingâ€™s room, kitchen, garden, garage, and many other amazing rooms!
- Challenge your friends on Facebook and reach the top of the leaderboards!

Download now and start swapping for endless fun.

Need some help? Visit our support page in the Royal Match app or send us a message at contact@dreamgames.com.

title: Top Heroes: Kingdom Saga
summary:
Join 50 Million Players and Counting!
Top Heroes is an RPG strategy game set in a captivating fantasy world. A thrilling adventure awaits as you explore uncharted lands. The world is under siege by an ancient evil, threatening to plunge everything into chaos. Will you lead your heroes to victory and restore peace to the land?

Recruit legendary heroes from across the realm, each with unique abilities and skills. From valiant knights to cunning sorcerers, assemble your dream team and lead your empire to glory!

â—† YOU ARE THE ADVENTURER!
Venture into uncharted lands filled with ancient ruins, hidden treasures, and perilous dungeons.

â—† YOU ARE THE CREATOR!
Build your territory and transform it into a thriving kingdom from the ground up!

â—† YOU ARE THE WARLORD!
Command your armies and engage in epic wars where strategy and tactics determine victory.

â—† YOU ARE THE DIPLOMAT!
Forge alliances with other players, negotiate agreements, and form powerful guilds to dominate the world together. Strength lies in unity!

â—† YOU ARE THE CONQUEROR!
Expand your territory, exploit resources, and eliminate your enemies to become the ultimate ruler.

Shape your own story today!

Enjoying Top Heroes? Join our Discord community at the link below to discover more about the game!

https://discord.gg/topheroes

Classic Sudoku is a logic-based number sudoku free puzzle game, and the goal is to place 1 to 9 digit numbers into each grid cell so that each number can only appear once in each row, each column, and each mini-grid. With our classic Sudoku number puzzle app, you can not only enjoy sudoku puzzle games anytime, anywhere, but also learn Sudoku techniques from it. title: Tangled Rope: Twisted Puzzle
summary:
Are you ready for a mind-bending puzzle experience? Welcome to Tangled Rope, the game that will challenge your brain and keep you hooked for hours! In Tangled Rope, your objective is simple: untangle the ropes and free the knots. But don't be fooled by the simplicityâ€”each level gets progressively more challenging, and the tangles more intricate.

Key Features:
Engaging Gameplay: Dive into the satisfying process of untangling complex knots and ropes. Each puzzle is a unique challenge that requires logic and strategy.
Increasing Difficulty: Start with easier levels to get the hang of it, then move on to more complicated tangles that will truly test your problem-solving skills.
Stunning Graphics: Enjoy beautifully designed levels with colorful ropes and serene backgrounds that enhance your gaming experience.
Intuitive Controls: Simply drag and slide to untangle the ropes. The user-friendly interface ensures that you can focus on solving the puzzles without any hassle.
Hints and Solutions: Stuck on a particularly tough knot? Use hints to get back on track or view the solution to learn the trick.
Why You'll Love Tangled Rope:
Tangled Rope is more than just a gameâ€”it's a workout for your brain! Perfect for puzzle enthusiasts of all ages, it offers endless hours of entertainment and a sense of accomplishment as you conquer each level. Whether you're looking to relax and unwind or challenge yourself with intricate puzzles, Tangled Rope is the game for you.

Download Tangled Rope today and start untangling! With its addictive gameplay and increasing challenges, you won't be able to put it down. Are you ready to take on the twisty, tangly challenge?

summary:

Relax, focus, and feel the joy of snapping picture fragments together to reveal stunning scenes. Every perfect snap brings that deeply satisfying â€œahaâ€ moment youâ€™ll want to experience again and again!

In Jigmerge Puzzles, each image is divided into photo tiles that can be freely rearranged, and reconnected. Your goal is to analyze patterns, discover hidden hints, and restore the original picture. Itâ€™s more than just a jigsawâ€”each puzzle challenges your logic, observation, and creativity.

Whether youâ€™re a fan of jigsaw puzzles, matching games, or brain teasers, Jigmerge Puzzles offers a refreshing twist on the classics. Itâ€™s your perfect mix of calm, challenge, and creativityâ€”ideal for both adults and kids alike.

title: Survivor.io
summary:
Dangerous zombies are attacking the entire city! The city is in peril!
Awakened by the trial of dreams, you've no choice but to take on the heroic mantle of saving the city!
As a human warrior with unlimited potential, you and other survivors will have to pick up your weapons and battle these evil and dangerous zombies!
The horde far outnumbers you - any slip-up and you'll get caught in dire straits!
Faced with crisis, you must find a way to survive!

title: Card Queen: Duel
summary:
Welcome to Card Queen: Duel â€“ a fantasy card world brimming with strategy and charm!
Here, you will collect cards embodied by powerful and beautiful queens, build an unbeatable deck, and engage in thrilling duels against rivals. Your wisdom and tactics will determine who is the one true Card Queen!

Core Gameplay
âœ¨ Collect Legendary Queens:
Use Gold and Gems to tear open card packs and summon Queens with unique designs and dazzling skills. From divine warriors to enchanting mages, hundreds of beautiful cards in various styles await your command. Build a legendary collection that belongs only to you!

ğŸ¯ The Wisdom of Three-Card Victory:
In each battle, you will deploy three carefully selected beauty cards. Every card possesses unique Attack, HP, and Skill stats. Plan your strategy wisely: will you overpower your opponent with brute force, or outsmart them with clever skills? Victory lies at your fingertips.

âš”ï¸ Fair Strategic Duels:
Before each match begins, a coin toss will decide who goes first â€“ ensuring every duel is fair and exciting. Strike first or counter your opponentâ€™s moves: this tests not only the strength of your deck but also your ability to adapt under pressure!

Dive into this captivating adventure that combines card collecting, tactical planning, and a test of luck!
Are you ready to take on the challenge?

title: Food Run - Crowd Control Game
summary:
Play with thousands of foods! Go through gates to get even more!

You can even feed your food to other foods! Yum!

HIGHLIGHTS
â—‰ Tons of cute and kawaii foods to discover
â—‰ Control a huge crowd of foods - so many that you'll lose count!
â—‰ Lots of hats to decorate your foods with
â—‰ Simple and addictive gameplay!
â—‰ Collect coins and become rich!
â—‰ Play while offline! No wifi needed!

THE STORY
It's a crazy world, there's food running around everywhere! Help guide the cute foods through the level as they race towards the end. Feed the foods to other foods at the end of the level to unlock even more foods! Keep playing to discover more foods and surprises!

HOW TO PLAY
Gameplay is simple and addicting! Tap to start running down the road and swipe left and right to go through gates. If you can get to the end of the level, your foods will jump into another food's mouth to feed it! Use the coins to upgrade your number of foods and coins to make even more money! Easy to play, hard to master!

PLAY OFFLINE
Internet is not required to play this game! Enjoy!

title: UNO!â„¢
summary:
UNO!â„¢ is now mobile! Take the classic card game from the kitchen table anywhere! Now with new rules, world series tournaments, modes of play, and much more. Whether youâ€™re at home, on the go, an UNO!â„¢ veteran or completely new, UNO!â„¢ has something for everyone in the family. UNO!â„¢ is a fun and memorable family-friendly card game wherever and whenever.

Ready. Set. UNO!â„¢
- Play the classic card game, UNO!â„¢, or select from a variety of house rules to play in real-time matches
- Compete in tournaments and events to win free rewards and top the leaderboards
- Partner up with friends or family, play in 2v2 mode, and collaborate to win
- Connect anytime, anywhere with family and friends from around the world.

FEATURES
The Classic Game at your Fingertips
New to UNO!â„¢ or wanting to play your favorite card game? Tap Quick Play and start up a new game with classic UNO!â„¢ rules. Get ready for new monthly rewards and events!

Play with Friends
Play with friends or family! Set up your own house rules and play your way. UNO!â„¢ is a family-friendly party that makes it free and easy for anyone to join!

Buddy Up
Find a friend or family and partner up to battle in 2 player teams. Help each other reduce your hand (or your partnerâ€™s) to zero as quickly as possible to beat the other team!

Connect, Chat, Shout UNO!â„¢
Connect with your buddies in UNO!â„¢ with clubs and send each other gifts. Make a strategy and remember to shout UNO before anyone else.

New Challenges at Every Level
Compete in World Series tournaments and special events to win free rewards. Top the leaderboards and show off to your friends and family! Then spin the wheel and try your fortune to get free rewards every day!

This no-holds-barred mode is as wacky as UNO!â„¢ gets. Forget the classic mode - house rules on, two-deck play, and free winnings up to 600 times what you put in to make you the coin master! But beware, in this wild game mode, you win big or go home empty-handed! Are you up for the challenge?

title: MONOPOLY GO!
summary:
The wizarding world awaits! Hit GO! Roll the dice with the witches and wizards of Harry Potter! Earn MONOPOLY money, interact with your friends, family members and fellow Tycoons from around the world as you explore the expanding universe of MONOPOLY GO - now even more magical, welcoming iconic Hogwarts witches and wizards like Harry Potter, Albus Dumbledore, Hermione Granger, Severus Snape and many more! Itâ€™s the new way to play - board flipping cleanup not required!

Unlock magical maps! Discover Hogwarts Treasures!

Escape, enjoy, dream, scheme and stay in touch with this newly reimagined Harry Potter twist on MONOPOLY! Let everyone's favorite zillionaire, Mr. MONOPOLY, be your guide as you enjoy your favorite Harry Potter moments and Hogwarts maps like Hogsmeade, the Forbidden Forest or Diagon Alley.

So MONOPOLY GO!

Experience classic fun and visuals with gameplay fit for your phone! Collect Properties, build Houses and Hotels, pull Chance Cards, and of course, earn that MONOPOLY Money! Play with your favorite game Tokens such as the Racecar, Top Hat, Battleship, and more. Earn more tokens as you go - your favorite Harry Potter wizard or witch might be one!

See MONOPOLY icons like Mr. M, Scottie and Ms. MONOPOLY come to life, and brand new characters too!

Your Family Table!

Help or hinder! - You and friends can earn easy money with Community Chest and co-op events! Or heist their banks to help yourself get to the top.

The Hogwarts Express has arrived!

Collect and trade story-filled stickers with friends and family and in our MONOPOLY GO! Facebook Trading Groups! Complete the magical Harry Potter-themed album for huge rewards! Every collection features great wizards and witches, and takes you through iconic places across Hogwarts.

Features!

BUY & BUILD YOUR WAY TO THE TOP

Collect Property Tile Sets to build Houses and upgrade your Houses to Hotels to get even more rent from friends! All you have to do is hit GO! Can you catch the golden snitch?

ENJOY THAT CLASSIC MONOPOLY ATMOSPHERE

Roll the dice to enjoy the classic MONOPOLY board you know and love. Featuring familiar faces such as MR. MONOPOLY, and familiar spaces such as jail (womp womp!), Railroads, Properties, Tokens and more!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS AND FAMILY

Get social! Play with friends to take full advantage of new magical mini-games such as Community Chest â€“ where you and friends take a break from mischief and work together!

NEW OPPORTUNITIES EVERY DAY

Play Tournaments, the Prize Drop plinko mini-game, the Cash Grab mini-game and follow our Events for big rewards. With Harry Potter entering the world of MONOPOLY GO! mini-games are even more magical and fun! Roll into the wizarding world now and discover the magic of Harry Potter.

MONOPOLY GO! is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. Internet connection is required to play the game.

title: Among Us
summary:
Play online or over local WiFi with 4-15 players as you attempt to prep your spaceship for departure, but beware as one will be an impostor bent on killing everyone!

Crewmates can win by completing all tasks or discovering and voting the impostor off the ship.

The Impostor can use sabotage to cause chaos, making for easier kills and better alibis.

title: Jelly Hole: Roll & Eat Pals
summary:
THE FRUITY HOLE GAME YOU DIDNâ€™T KNOW YOU NEEDED

Say what now? Thatâ€™s right, this delightful app mixes an eating game with a black hole: each level youâ€™ll guide the black hole around the field, swallowing jelly fruits whole as fast as you can. Addicting and fun to play, fans of arcade games will love the classic graphics, easy interface, and of course, dropping fruits into the hole!

FRUITS AWAY!

Each level consists of a field filled with fruit, and your job is to swallow it all whole. Zip around eating jelly fruit as fast and efficiently as you can, avoiding accidentally blocking your black hole, knocking fruit off the field, or running out of time. Levels get progressively more difficult so take the time to hone your jelly munching skills. Despite the timer this hole game is tons of fun to play for all ages and skill levels, and is chock full of great features.

Look forward to:

Play Disney Solitaire now and step into a world where every game leads to magic, and every victory brings you closer to unlocking an enchanting scene. With stunning visuals, engaging gameplay, and heartwarming moments, Disney Solitaire is your ticket to a magical escape.

ğŸŒŸ Why Disney Solitaire is Perfect for You ğŸŒŸ

Disney Solitaire is intended for those 18 and older.
