title: Fishdom
summary:
Dive into the fantastic world of Fishdom! You're in for an ocean of exciting levels, scores of adorable fish and pets, and a sea of captivating events!

Explore incredible underwater adventures! Unlock aquariums and decorate them to your taste, creating perfect homes for cute fish and their friends.

Game Features:
â— Original gameplay: beat match-3 levels to create the perfect home for your fish!
â— Thousands of captivating levels with powerful boosters!
â— Loads of beautiful decorations and unlimited creative freedom: what the aquariums look like is entirely up to you!
â— Exciting events: embark on expeditions, collect keys in season adventures, and get awesome rewards like power-ups, boosters, unlimited lives, pets, and aquarium decorations!
â— Have fun together: compete against other players, team up, and win fantastic prizes! Play with your Facebook friends, or make new friends in the game community!

Fishdom is free to play, but some in-game elements (including randomized items) can be purchased for real money.

A Wi-Fi or internet connection is not required to play.
*An internet connection is required to access competitions and additional features."

Do you like Fishdom? Follow us!
Facebook: facebook.com/Fishdom
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fishdom_mobile/

Need to report an issue or ask a question? Contact Player Support through the game by going to Settings > Help and Support. If you can't access the game, use the web chat by clicking the chat icon in the lower right corner of our website: https://playrix.helpshift.com/hc/en/4-fishdom/

Privacy Policy:
https://playrix.com/privacy/index.html

title: Fire Emblem Heroes
summary:
Nintendo's hit strategy-RPG Fire Emblem series, which has been going strong for more than 30 years, continues its journey on smart devices.

Fight battles customized for touch screens and on-the-go play. Summon characters from across the Fire Emblem universe. Develop your Heroes' skills, and take them to new heights. This is your adventureâ€”a Fire Emblem that's like nothing you've seen before!

This application is free to download and offers some optional in-app purchases.

â–  An epic quest

The game features an ongoing, original story where new characters and dozens upon dozens of battle-tested Heroes from across the Fire Emblem universe meet.

There are over 2,700 story stages available as of August 2025! (This total includes all difficulty modes.) Clear these story stages and you'll earn Orbs, which are used for summoning Heroes.
New story chapters are added frequently, so don't miss out!

â–  Intense battles

Take part in strategic turn-based battles streamlined for on-the-go play with maps that fit in the palm of your hand! You'll need to think hard about the advantages and disadvantages of each Hero's weapon...and even evaluate the map itself as you battle. Lead your army with easy touch-and-drag controls, including the ability to attack by simply swiping an ally over an enemy.

New to strategic turn-based battles? Don't worry! Use the Auto-Battle option to have your characters fight on their own.

â–  Strengthen your favorite Heroes

There are many ways to strengthen your allies: leveling, skills, weapons, equipable items, and more. Take your characters to greater and greater heights as you battle for victory.

â–  Replayable modes

In addition to the main story, there are many other modes where you can strengthen your allies, compete against other players, and more.

â–  Original characters meet legendary Heroes

The game features numerous Hero characters from the Fire Emblem series and brand-new characters created by artists Yusuke Kozaki, Shigeki Maeshima, and Yoshiku. Some Heroes will fight at your side as allies, while others may stand in your way as fierce enemies to be defeated and added to your army.

Featuring Heroes from the following games in the series!

title: Tokyo Debunker
summary:
At the prestigious Darkwick Academy, your unruly classmates have sold their souls to demons in exchange for a wishâ€¦ and youâ€™ll have to find a way to make them work together to solve supernatural cases all over Tokyo. If you get stuck, you can always turn to Darkwickâ€™s clever cat familiars for their support!

Enjoy a wide variety of gameplay modes!
-Explore a gripping story through comics and Live 2D
-Build new facilities with your adorable cat familiars
-Collect cute and quirky cats
-Battle monsters with your ghoul classmates
-Play rhythm games to collect powerful items
-Join other players in exciting co-op modes

Your time with us is what you make itâ€¦
Welcome to the bizarre charms of Tokyoâ€™s dark side.

Follow us on SNS:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/tokyodebunker
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tokyodebunker/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TokyoDebunker/

Tokyo Debunker is recommended for those who...

â€¢ Crave a captivating interactive story where romance intertwines with mystery, danger, and supernatural elements.
â€¢ Immerse yourself in a stylish dating sim featuring ikemen and thrilling plot twists.
â€¢ Unlock secrets through special episodes and explore deep love stories with ikemen demons.
â€¢ Experience passionate relationships in high-stakes, supernatural situations.
â€¢ Step into a beautifully designed otome game where every choice shapes your fantasy.
â€¢ Engage with charming ikemen characters in a luxurious fantasy setting, making unforgettable romantic decisions.
â€¢ Dive into anime or manga-inspired storytelling, blending romance, demons, and supernatural themes.
â€¢ Enjoy stunning art and elegant narratives, reminiscent of otome novels, that bring your love goals to life.
â€¢ Explore an inclusive, diverse dating sim.
â€¢ Discover fateful romances, breathtaking fantasy, and unforgettable connections with supernatural ikemen.

title: BrownDust2 - Full Burst RPG
summary:
â–£ Game Introduction â–£

â–  2.5th Anniversary Bunny Girl Update in Progress!â– 
Get Fan Favorite Wilhelmina's New Costume FREE: Fully Upgraded â˜…5 Frozen Queen Wilhelmina!
Get 500 free draws over 50 days! Now's the chance for returning players!
Master! Come see us in our Snow Rabbit outfits!

â–  A New Adventure RPG with Console-Level Graphics â– 
Experience High-End 2D graphics with overwhelming detail!
Enjoy the diverse charms of Live 2D characters drawn by top-tier illustrators,
along with beautifully designed fields that add excitement to your adventures.

â–  Immersive Adventures in Both Landscape and Vertical Mode â– 
A user-friendly interface optimized for both landscape and vertical screens!
Experience a whole new level of immersion as you explore the expanded world.

â–  Console-Style Game Pack that Transcends Time and Space with a Captivating Storyline â– 
The game pack system evokes the nostalgia of classic console games!
Immerse yourself in a thrilling storyline that unfolds in a multi-universe world and discover what lies beyond.

â–  The core of Browndust: battle system with a quarter-view perspective â– 
A 3x4 simulation battle system that maximizes the tension!
Don't miss the excitement of thrilling battles during adventures with well-designed intuitive turn-based battles

â–  User-vs-User PvP and Evil Castle to Complete Your Adventure â– 
Constantly test your own strategies and experience the joy of victory!
Complete your adventure while enjoying the Evil Castle content that tests your limits.

title: Dark War Survival
summary:
Gear up and brace yourself for the ultimate test of zombie apocalypse survival! Dive into thrilling gameplay and uncover captivating events that await your exploration!

As a sudden and catastrophic zombie virus ravages human society, your once cozy life is shattered. Family and friends turn into the walking dead before your very eyes. Escaping the chaos of your crumbling home, you now face the ultimate challenge: setting up a shelter to survive the zombie apocalyptic world, and reigniting the flames of human civilization.

Can you successfully adapt to the hostile environment teeming with dangers, and lead your fellow survivors in rebuilding civilization? It's time for you to step up!

UNIQUE FEATURES

Assign Jobs
Assign your survivors to specialized work to maximize your shelter's growth. Don't forget to keep an eye on their health and happiness to ensure their productivity!

STRATEGIC MECHANICS

Gather & Explore
Venture into the desolate wastelands in search of valuable resources and rare items. Uncover hidden treasures and unlock new territories where dangers also lurk around every corner.

Build & Expand
Construct a sturdy shelter and fortify it against the ever-evolving zombie threats. Upgrade your defenses, unlock powerful weapons, and establish a safe haven for fellow survivors.

Recruit & Research
As the leader, you must assemble a diverse team of survivors with unique skills and abilities. Train them and equip them with powerful weapons and technologies to maximize their potential in battles against the undead.

Ally & Conquer
Join forces with other survivors to create a legendary alliance. Work together to conquer difficult challenges, win epic battles, and strategize to reclaim the world from the clutches of the undead.

Do you have what it takes to survive and thrive in the zombie apocalypse? Download the game and dive in now!

title: Disney Solitaire
summary:
Welcome to Disney Solitaire, the ultimate solitaire card game that transforms classic tripeaks solitaire into an exciting experience filled with Disney magic!

Play through beautifully designed levels inspired by iconic Disney and Pixar scenes while solving fun and challenging puzzles.

Step into the enchanting realm of Disney Solitaire, where every postcard recreates an iconic scene from the worlds of Disney and Pixar!
From the moment you start playing, youâ€™ll find yourself immersed in colorful scenes featuring some of your favorite characters like Buzz Lightyear, Aladdin, Elsa, and Moana.

This isnâ€™t just another solitaire game; itâ€™s a vibrant experience packed with excitement, strategy, and whimsical charm.
Disney Solitaire redefines the solitaire card games experience with innovative gameplay features. Collect unique power-ups and special cards that can change your strategy.

Play Disney Solitaire now and step into a world where every game leads to magic, and every victory brings you closer to unlocking an enchanting scene. With stunning visuals, engaging gameplay, and heartwarming moments, Disney Solitaire is your ticket to a magical escape.
Donâ€™t miss out â€“ your adventure awaits!

ğŸŒŸ Why Disney Solitaire is Perfect for You ğŸŒŸ
If youâ€™re a fan of solitaire card games with a twist, or love exploring the worlds of Disney and Pixar, this game is designed just for you. Solve fun tripeaks solitaire challenges while unlocking Disney-inspired scenes that bring some of your favorite stories to life.
Each level combines the strategy of solitaire games with magical Disney elements to keep you entertained and engaged. Whether you're looking for a relaxing pastime or a chance to test your skills, Disney Solitaire delivers endless fun and excitement.

ğŸ‰ Key Features of Disney Solitaire ğŸ‰
âœ” Innovative Solitaire Gameplay: Play Tripeaks solitaire with exciting power-ups and challenges!
âœ” Beloved Disney Characters: Recreate scenes with fan-favorites like Elsa, Moana, and Simba!
âœ” Collect and Decorate: Unlock beautiful Disney and Pixar- inspired puzzles and postcards.
âœ” Daily Challenges and Events: Donâ€™t miss special events with exclusive rewards to enhance your experience.
âœ” Easy to Play, Hard to Master: Perfect for beginners and experienced players of solitaire games alike.

âœ¨ Join the Magic of Disney Solitaire âœ¨
Embark on a journey filled with whimsy and wonder. Whether youâ€™re revisiting nostalgic Disney classics or discovering something new, Disney Solitaire offers an exciting twist on the solitaire card game you know and love.
Download now to explore iconic Disney and Pixar locations, solve charming Disney puzzles, and enjoy a fresh take on tripeaks solitaire. Let the magic begin!

ğŸ’– Designed for Disney Fans of All Ages ğŸ’–
With its enchanting visuals and simple yet captivating gameplay, Disney Solitaire is perfect for fans of solitaire games, Disney lovers, and puzzle enthusiasts. Take a break from your day and unwind in a world of endless magic!

Start Your Magical Journey Today!
What are you waiting for?
Download Disney Solitaire now and experience the charm of Disney and Pixar like never before. Take on delightful solitaire card games, recreate nostalgic Disney scenes and immerse yourself in the wonder of Disney puzzles.

Disney Solitaire is intended for those 18 and older. Disney Solitaire does not require payment to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game, including random items. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Disney Solitaire may also contain advertising.

You may require an internet connection to play Disney Solitaire and access its social features. You can also find more information about the functionality,
compatibility and interoperability of Disney Solitaire in the above description and additional app store information.
This game may contain flashing effects that could trigger seizures in sensitive individuals.

title: Age of Origins
summary:
â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…Itâ€™s time to download Age of Origins now and fight your way to glory!â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…
â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…Become the leader of the strongest army with the best tower defense to save the world!â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…
â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…Become the fastest action runner in history by passing through the gates to gain your honor!â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…

A virus is spreading throughout the world, causing the zombies to rise up and take over our homes. The land has fallen into complete chaos. Commander, we need you to help rebuild our city and lead the troops to regain control. Thereâ€™s no time to waste. Letâ€™s get started now!

Age of Origins is the most innovative war strategy game that incorporates classic tower defense and exciting hack & slash gameplay. As this gripping story unfolds, you will encounter all kinds of new challenges, creating a truly unique gaming experience.

City Building
- Reclaim the overrun buildings from the zombies.
- Rescue survivors hiding in the ruins to increase the population.
- Gather resources to build your city and take care of the residents.

Army Training
- Collect and train officers to lead your army into battle.
- Mix and match the officers for every possible scenario.
- Research and develop technology to prepare your soldiers for war.

Titans and Warplanes
- Activate the powerful Titans to assist in combat.
- Fly your warplane to soar over the adversary.
- Cultivate the Titans and Warplanes to strengthen your troops.

Alliance Teamwork
- Build an alliance with your friends to dominate the land.
- Time-attack with the alliance members to crush your opponents.
- Participate in larger-than-life PvP and GvG events with your allies.

Commander, this devastated world needs you now! You are our only hope!

title: Identity V
summary:
Identity V: 1 vs 4 Asymmetrical Horror Mobile Game

Fear Always Springs from the Unknown.

Game Introduction:

Join the Thrilling Party! Welcome to Identity V, the first asymmetrical horror mobile game developed by NetEase. With a gothic art style, mysterious storylines and exciting 1vs4 gameplay, Identity V will bring you a breathtaking experience.


Key Features:

Intensive 1vs4 Asymmetrical Combats:
Four Survivors: run from the ruthless hunter, cooperate with teammates, decode cipher machines, open the gate and escape;
One Hunter: familiar yourself with all of your killing powers. Be ready to catch and torture your preys.

Gothic Visual Style:
Travel back to the Victorian era and have a taste of its unique style.

Compelling Background Settings:
You will first enter the game as a detective, who receives a mysterious letter inviting him to investigate an abandoned manor and search for a missing girl. And as you get closer and closer to the truth, you find something horrifying...

Randomized Map Adjustments:
Within every new game, map would be altered accordingly. You will never know whatâ€™s to expect.

Select & Play Distinct Characters:
Multiple characters to choose from, customized characters to fit your own personal strategy and get the final victory!

Are you ready for it?

More Informations:
Website: https://www.identityvgame.com/
Facebook: www.facebook.com/IdentityV
Facebook Group: www.facebook.com/groups/identityVofficial/
Twitter: www.twitter.com/GameIdentityV
YouTube: www.youtube.com/c/IdentityV
Discord: https://discord.gg/FThHuCa4bn

title: Tasty Travels: Merge Game
summary:
Tasty Travels

"Open your phone and join us on a journey around the culinary world!"
In "Tasty Travels", you get to travel the world while experiencing local cuisines, learning to make various specialty dishes, and sharing with friends from all corners of the globe! The most exciting part? You can combine two identical ingredients to create new exquisite dishes, reveling in the joy of cooking!

Unique Gameplay: Merge and Explore
Innovative Merging: Discover and merge identical ingredients during your journey, exploring new culinary secrets and enjoying the unique fun of merging!
Culinary Map: Experience over 500 types of local cuisines, each with its unique method of preparation and story!
Quest Challenges: Assist other tourists with their food requests to unlock more recipes and travel destinations!

Social Interaction and Sharing
Global Food Community: Meet friends from around the world in "Tasty Travels", share your culinary adventures, and earn their admiration!
Recipe Sharing: Exchange recipes, jointly appreciate the beauty of food, making your travel more colorful and diverse!

Travel Destinations
Unlock New Locations: Collect coins to unlock new travel destinations!
World's Famous Culinary Cities: Explore and experience dozens of the world's famous culinary cities, each with its unique flavor and culture!

title: Seaside EscapeÂ®: Merge & Story
summary:
Kryphos has changed almost beyond recognition in the last five years, and fallen celebrity Rowan needs your help to turn things around. Here, the right merge can change everything.

Come and join us, and get lost in the world of Seaside Escape!

Game Features
â€¢ All it takes is a simple drag of your finger, to turn two basic items into something incredible!
â€¢ With hundreds of items, you can merge almost anything you can think of!
â€¢ Help the residents of Kryphos not only survive, but thrive!
â€¢ Help Rowan restore her shattered confidence and rebuild her life!
â€¢ Uncover hidden secrets as you rebuild Kryphos!
â€¢ There are surprises hiding around every corner, just waiting for you to find them!

Enjoying Seaside Escape? Learn more about the game on our Facebook Fan Page!

title: Top War: Battle Game
summary:
Commander, the Dark Legion is coming!

These Tyrants rule the world! Constant war, refugees scattered across the land and a world starved of hope. Who will liberate us? Become the strongest Commander and a fearless leader in the struggle against the legion, right alongside the freedom league! Merge to upgrade your power whether it's buildings, skills or units, if you can merge it, you can upgrade it!

- FEATURES -

Top War is an innovative strategy game featuring merge to upgrade gameplay, no more long upgrade waiting times, just merge two together and the upgrade will finish instantly! Recruit Legendary Heroes to lead the stationed Land, Navy and Airforce troops to victory! Upgrade heroes and troops with unique skills and equipment to lead all three armies to become immortal!

Start on a barren, deserted island and build an idyllic base to train your armies, improve your power and liberate the land. Strength doesn't come from just troops, and that's a good thing! Create a stylish yet formidable island with a variety of buildings and decorations at your disposal. Come and show-off your unique style!

Battle online with players from all over the world in a variety of game modes such as; Server v Server wars, Dark Forces, War Robots and weekly Capital Throne Showdowns all while experiencing the real battles with your alliance. Fight for glory, liberate the oppressed and dominate your enemies!


- PLEASE NOTE -

Top War: Battle Game is free-to-play and offers in-game purchases. Playing requires a network connection.

- FOLLOW US -

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Topwarbattlegame/
Discord: https://discord.gg/topwarbattlegameofficial

title: KAIJU NO. 8 THE GAME
summary:
Crush colossal Kaiju with a game-changing blow! Experience exhilarating attacks with intuitive controls!
Explore the world of KAIJU NO. 8, recreated with stunning visuals!

===========================
Introducing KAIJU NO. 8 THE GAME
===========================

Based on the global hit anime, adapted from the Shonen Jump+ sensation, KAIJU NO. 8 THE GAME brings you into the heart of the action! Witness epic battles between the Japan Anti-Kaiju Defense Force and cataclysmic Kaiju, all rendered in breathtaking graphics!

â—† Overpower colossal Kaiju in epic battles!
Engage in an intuitive turn-based combat system, packed with strategic depth! Select your Defense Force officers' skills to attack, and when the Kaiju's core is exposed, unleash devastating ultimate attacks to deliver the final blow!

â—† See the Defense Force in action in stunning details!
Feel the raw power of KAIJU NO. 8's signature punch, the razor-sharp precision of Soshiro Hoshina's blades, and the earth-shattering power of Kikoru Shinomiya's ax! All brought to life with stunning, high-end graphics!

â—† Explore the expanding universe of KAIJU NO. 8!
Relive the anime's gripping story, discover exclusive original narratives, and delve into the untold stories of your favorite characters!

â—† Featuring an all-star voice actor cast!
Kafka Hibino/KAIJU NO. 8: Masaya Fukunishi
Mina Ashiro: Asami Seto
Reno Ichikawa: Wataru Katoh
Kikoru Shinomiya: Fairouz Ai
Soshiro Hoshina: Kengo Kawanishi
Gen Narumi: Koki Uchiyama
Isao Shinomiya: Tessyo Genda

...and many more!

title: Lords Mobile: tokidoki GO!
summary:
Lords Mobile is collaborating with tokidoki! Come get exclusive Skins, Decorations, Emotes, Avatars, and more!

Are you ready for a REAL fight?

The true Emperor has fallen. We need a real hero, a true Lord who can unite the Kingdoms. Recruit heroes from various backgrounds, from dwarves and mermaids to dark elves and steampunk robots, and assemble your army in this magical world! Fight and conquer to establish your empire in the strategy games!

[Game Features]:

â–¶â–¶ Embark on the Guild Expedition â—€â—€
Experience a grand Guild vs Guild battle, where multiple guilds compete against each other to expand their territory. Troops will not perish in this special battleground, allowing you to unleash your full potential without any worries! Unite your guild and strategize to conquer the battlefield!

â–¶ â–¶ Collect Artifacts! â—€â—€
Discover ancient Artifacts in the Artifact Hall. Upgrade and enhance them to unlock their true power!

â–¶ â–¶ Build Your Own Kingdom â—€â—€
Upgrade buildings, conduct research, train your troops, level your Heroes and lead your Kingdom well to prosper in this strategy game!

â–¶ â–¶ Utilize Troop Formations â—€â—€
4 different troop types, and 6 different troop formations for you to choose from! Plan your lineups, take advantage of the counter system, and pair your troops with the right Heroes! Perfect your strategy to defeat your enemies!

â–¶ â–¶ Powerful Heroes Await â—€â—€
Create a strong team of 5 Heroes to fight through an RPG-style campaign! Let them lead your kingdom to glory as war generals!

â–¶ â–¶ Forge Alliances â—€â—€
Join a guild to fight alongside your allies! Ride into war together to conquer various exhilarating events: Guild Wars, Kingdom Versus Kingdom battles, Battle Royals, Wonder Wars, Darknest Invasions, and much more!

â–¶ â–¶ Clash Online with Global Players â—€â—€
Brawl with millions of players from all over the world, and defeat those who stand in your way! Seize the throne and rule over all in this amazing strategy game!

â–¶ â–¶ Animated Battles â—€â—€
Experience the thrill of war as your armies clash in beautiful 3D graphics! Watch as your Heroes unleash their skills and harness their mystical power!


===Information===

Discord: https://discord.com/invite/lordsmobile
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LordsMobile
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/LordsMobile

Note: This game requires an internet connection to play.

Customer Service: help.lordsmobile.android@igg.com

title: LINE POP2
summary:
The long-awaited sequel to the game played by 50 million people around the world!
Simple and enjoyable ""line 'em up"" style gameplay. POP blocks in a hexagonal grid!
Over 15 million downloads worldwide!

â–  How to play LINE POP2
Move blocks in 6 different directions to line up 3 of a kind and clear them from the board. Complete missions and clear levels. Connect with your LINE account to exchange gifts and compete in the rankings.

â–  Various stages
Complete missions, clear every stage, and fill in the entire map! If a stage is too tough, you can always skip it and come back later. New stages are added every month so there's always new fun to be had!

â–  Helper characters and items
Clear missions and stages more easily with handy helper characters! Choose the helper with the right skillset for the stage you're on. Powerful items are also available to make stages easier, but you'll have to use them strategically!

â–  Regular event updates and feature additions
Login bonuses, popular character tie-ups, and new features are constantly being added for never-ending fun! Plus, with over 2 years of constant updates since release, there's always fresh content to keep you popping!

title: Pikmin Bloom
summary:
Pikmin Bloom offers a fun way to earn rewards for going outside and exploring with friends! With the brand-new Weekly Challenges feature, you can team up with others, no matter how far away they might be, and work towards a shared steps goal!
__
COLLECT over 150 types of unique Decor Pikmin! Some wear fishing lures, some don hamburger buns, and others flaunt paper airplanes, just to name a few.

EXPLORE your neighborhood to add more Pikmin to your squad! The more you walk, the more seedlings and fruit youâ€™ll find.

TEAM UP with friends to take down mushrooms and earn rewards! Select a dream team of Pikmin to increase your score and nab rarer fruit types!

DECORATE the world with beautiful flowers everywhere you go! Watch the map fill up with colorful blossoms, planted by you and by other players nearby!

Head outside, explore your neighborhood, and make the world bloom!

_______________

Notes:
- This app is free-to-play and offers in-game purchases. It is optimized for smartphones, not tablets.
- It is recommended to play while connected to a network (Wi-Fi, 3G, 4G, 5G, or LTE) in order to obtain accurate location information.
- Supported Devices: Devices with at least 2 GB of RAM running on Android 9.0 or above
- Compatibility is not guaranteed for devices without GPS capabilities or devices that are connected only to Wi-Fi networks.
- Google Fit needs to be installed and permissions enabled in order for Pikmin Bloom to accurately track your steps.
- Compatibility information may be changed at any time.
- Information current as of August, 2022.
- Compatibility is not guaranteed for all devices.
- Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically reduce battery life.

- Some functions require support for the following services:
ARCore - For optimal performance, it is recommended that you use a device with at least 2 GB of RAM. If you are experiencing frequent problems such as device crashes or delays while using Pikmin Bloom, please try the following troubleshooting steps.
Close all apps except Pikmin Bloom while you are playing.
Use the most recent operating system available for your device.
If the problem persists, please contact us with details.
Note: Many devices that do not have a built-in data-network connection do not include a GPS sensor. In the event of mobile-data network congestion, such devices may not be able to maintain a sufficient GPS signal to play.

title: PUBG Mobile
summary:
â–¶ Frosty Funland Theme Mode â—€
A new Frosty Funland Theme Mode is coming to PUBG MOBILE.
In this mode, youâ€™ll find an adorable Penguin Town, the new home of the Penguin Kingdom, and a Penguin Village where the penguins have settled.
Explore Penguin Town and Penguin Village to earn various rewards, including Penguin Crates and more!

â–¶ Winter Animal NPCs â—€
In Frosty Funland Theme Mode, you can interact with various Winter Animal NPCs.
Each Winter Animal NPC is categorized by rarity â€“ Normal, Rare, and Mythic. Normal NPCs offer items and hairstyles through different types of interactions.
You can obtain special items such as Magic Ice Skates, Salted Fish Rocket Launcher, and Strength Potion by interacting with Rare NPCs.
You can even invite Mythic NPCs, like the Ninja Penguin, to your team to fight alongside you.
Interact with Winter Animal NPCs to leverage diverse tactics!

â–¶ Classic Mode Update â—€
Balance and attribute adjustments have been made to some firearms.
You can now exchange for New Premium Firearms Packs and Revival Packs at the in-game shop, and the system has been improved to allow access to new discounts and update previews.
New features such as the loot box carrying system and the Loot Truck have been added.
The underwater village previously located between the Rozhok and Ruins areas has been renewed into a harbor-style Boatyard.
Enjoy more freedom in combat with updated weapon attributes and newly added packages at the in-game shop!

â–¶PUBG Mobileâ—€
PUBG Mobile is a battle royale genre survival game where multiple users fight against one another based on their own tactic with diverse firearms and items to be the last one standing. PUBG is a multi-play game offering free-to-play one-on-one matches and team matches and holds esports every season bringing in diverse attractions.

â–¶Additional fee is required to purchase items for sale.

â–¶In this app, players can only use content provided in Korea.

https://pubgmobile.helpshift.com

title: Limbus Company
summary:
FACE THE SIN, SAVE THE E.G.O

As the Executive Manager of Limbus Company, lead your group of twelve Sinners,
venture into the buried facilities of Lobotomy Corporation, and lay claim on the Golden Boughs.


â–¶ A Combination of Turn-based RPG and Realtime Brawl
Each turn results in a display of exhilarating action.
In the combat phase, units on both sides will act simultaneously.
During the scramble, characters targeting each other may Clash.
The outcome of a Clash depends on the strength of their opposing skills and a sprinkle of luck; the winner can shut down the loser's skill.
Ensure you use the right skills to win Clashes.

â–¶ Single-handed Skirmishing
Connect skill icons across the grid, and your units will take action according to your commands.
Chaining skills of the same color allows you to deal greater damage.
Using simple and practical controls, watch as the Sinners dance to your tempo.

â–¶ Create Diverse Strategies with Identities and E.G.O
Form teams of Identities and equip them with an arsenal of E.G.O that will create powerful synergies.
Your foes come armed with a variety of Affinity-based attacks and tricky effects.
In particular, Abnormalities are formidable foes that may prove to be considerable challenges.
Learn their behavior and weaknesses, and compose the right team to eventually conquer them.

â–¶ Immerse Yourself in the World of Project Moon
From the creators of Lobotomy Corporation and Library of Ruina, another tale set in the same, unique world unfolds.
In this massive dystopian metropolis, you will embark on a journey to find Golden Boughs with a cast of 12 Sinners.
Enjoy the gripping story and the series of events that await.
All dialogue in the main story comes fully voiced in Korean.

Best of luck, Dear Manager.



- Official Game Website: https://limbuscompany.global/
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/LimbusCompany_B/

- Studio Website: https://projectmoon.studio/
- Studio Twitter: https://twitter.com/ProjMoonStudio/
- Developer YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@ProjectMoonOfficial/



User game profiles, including guest profiles, can be linked to an external (Apple/Google) account of choice. For Steam versions, the profile is automatically linked to the user's Steam account when launching the game. Profiles that have already been linked can integrate multiple external accounts.

title: Summoners War
summary:
Summoners War: Sky Arena
The legendary turn-based strategy RPG with immersive storytelling â€” loved by over 300 million Summoners worldwide!

Join the spectacular global war alongside over 1,000 Monsters and experience the ultimate strategic fantasy battle.

The more you fight and refine your perfect strategies, the more your Monsters will grow into cherished companions across the Sky Islands.

[Summoners War: Sky Arena]
Official Community: https://www.facebook.com/SummonersWarCom2us/

â–¶ Game Features

â—† Stunning Action and Infinite Strategy
Experience dynamic battles in a truly different fantasy world!
Utilize 23 types of Rune Sets, each with unique effects,
and build your own strategy to claim victory.
Simple controls, endless tactical possibilities!

â—† The True Essence of a Collectible RPG: Massive Monster Collection
Fire, Water, Wind, Light, and Dark!
Five attributes and over 1,000 Monsters, each with distinctive skills and styles.
Maximize each Monsterâ€™s individuality and craft the ultimate strategy for thrilling victories!

â—† A World of Endless Adventure and Battle
Village, battle, adventure, collection, growth, and crafting!
Uncover the schemes of dark forces and take down powerful bosses like Dragons and Giants.
Join real-time 3-player raids, awaken new power in the Dimension Hole,
explore Tartarusâ€™ Labyrinth, hunt giant slimes with guildmates,
and engage in intense Guild PvP battles.
An ever-evolving world of massive contentâ€”
Your adventure begins now in Summoners War!

â—† Real-Time Global Strategy Battles
Real-time tactical duels that begin with Pick & Ban!
Engage others in Challenge Battle, where victory belongs to strategy with equally provided Monsters.
Compete in the World Arena, the pinnacle of strategic combat,
and prove your mastery on the global stage in the SWC (Summoners War World Championship)!

â—† Upgraded Growth and Farming Systems
Continuous updates now support faster progression for both new and returning Summoners!
Take on Summoner support quests and obtain guaranteed Nat 5 Monsters.
Enjoy improved farming rewards and less grind through the newly added Ameria's Luck and Scout Battle.
Grow with pace and dive straight into the vast world of Summoners War!

***
Device App Access Permission Notice
â–¶ Notice per access permission
Access permissions are requested in order for us to provide you with the following service when you use the app.

[Required]
None

[Optional]
- NOTIFICATION: The permission is required to receive info sent from the game app and advertisement push notifications.
- AUDIO: The permission is required to use the voice feature.
- STORAGE (Under OS 10.0): The permission is required to use the recording feature in the game.

â€» You'll be able to enjoy the service except features related to above authorities even if you don't give permission to the above.

â–¶How to remove access permissions
After allowing the access permission, you can revoke or modify the access permissions as follows:

[OS 6.0 and up]
Settings > Apps > Select the app > Permissions > allow or deny permissions

[Under OS 6.0]
Upgrade the OS to deny access permission or delete app

title: Resident Evil Survival Unit
summary:
In the world of â€œResident Evil Survival Unit,â€ strategy holds the key to survival.
As an unknown infection spreads, the city crumbles in the blink of an eye.
You are left stranded in the ruins with a group of isolated survivors.
Build your base, secure resources, and expand your influence to carve out a path to survival!

â–¶ Deploy survivors and devise your strategy!
Combat, gathering, technology survivors with diverse skills await your command.
Assign operatives to roles suited for each situation and build defensive lines to fend off the infected.

Each move you make can tip the tide of battle and greatly increase your chances of survival.

â–¶ Rebuild your base amidst the ruins
Center your efforts around an abandoned mansion, restoring its facilities one by one to lay the groundwork for survival.
Strategically manage resources, defenses, and research to create a powerful stronghold!

â–¶ Explore, expand and evolve in a chaotic world
As you scour the map for resources, youâ€™ll encounter other survivor groups.
Will you choose cooperation or conflict?
Your decisions will shape the future!
Your base will grow beyond being a mere safe-house, evolving into an impenetrable stronghold.

â–¶ Plan with strategy, make split-second decisions, and survive!
From building placement and operative deployment to combat loadout every choice you make will influence battlefield readiness in real time.
Expand and reinforce your stronghold and forge alliances that lay the foundation to survive.
Every decision directly impacts your chances of survival.

â–¶ An exclusive new story that goes beyond the â€œResident Evilâ€ series you know and love
Join iconic characters like Leon S. Kennedy, Claire Redfield, and Jill Valentine as they embark on a journey for survival.
In this world where everything depends on strategy, your choices will shape the story.

Set in the world of â€œResident Evil Survival Unit,â€ rise above the fear.

title: GIRLS' FRONTLINE 2: EXILIUM
summary:
The end of an era, the dawn of another; the fall of a faction, the rise of another... The torchbearers shall shine upon the brave new world.

After severing ties with G&K, the Commander bid farewell to the past and chose to venture into the contamination zones. During their journey, the Commander encountered more and more individuals and Tactical Dolls. Each with their own unique stories, they became indispensable members of the Commander's team. The Commander, who only sought to complete bounty missions smoothly and earn a stable income, was unexpectedly ambushed during what appeared to be a routine transport mission. Far from the bustling vortex, it became clear that the Commander had been drawn into an even larger maelstrom...

GIRLS' FRONTLINE 2: EXILIUM is a Post-Apocalyptic Tactical RPG. In this game, you will fully experience:

[3D Immersive Combat, Multidimensional Strategy]
Stages are enriched with dynamic elements, including various cover options, mechanisms, and terrains. Analyze the combat situation and strategically lead your Dolls to victory.

[Realistic Weapon System, Free-Form Weapon Customization]
Handguns, machine guns, shotgunsâ€”every type of weapon is available with a 360Â° preview. Freely attach weapon accessories to create a unique appearance for your weapons. Equip your team with the finest weapons to face the toughest enemies.

[Immersive Animations, 360Â° Character Interaction]
Featuring high-quality character models with rich interactive features. In the Refitting Room, you can freely interact with the Dolls. In the Dormitory, you can use the dynamic camera to capture their day-to-day moments, and enjoy a unique, cozy experience.

[Covenant Ring: Forge Unbreakable Bonds with Your Dolls]
Inscribe your Covenant and unlock exclusive archives, memories, and voice lines for your Dolls. Affinity can be deepened through gift-giving. A Covenant with your Dolls can be formed at a certain Affinity level, which unlocks an exclusive Covenant Projection.

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@GFL2EXILlUMGLOBAL
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EXILIUMGLOBAL
Official Website: https://gf2.haoplay.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/gfl2-exilium

Supported Specifications:
RAM: 4 GB or more
Storage Space: 18 GB of available storage space or more
Operating System: Android 7.0 and above

title: Cell Survivor
summary:
Embark on an epic adventure in Cell Survivor, a tactical RPG game that tests your survival skills in intense microscopic battles within survival games. ğŸš€ Dive into the vast cellular universe and strategically defeat unpredictable virus bosses with precision, quick reflexes, and tactical prowess in this roguelike RPG. Gear up to unleash your inner warrior in one of the most exhilarating RPG survival games crafted to date among top tower defense games!

ğŸ® Gameplay:
Progress through Cell Survivor, a challenging survival games, facing off against increasingly challenging virus bosses that demand sharp combat tactics and strategic foresight. Each boss is like a complex puzzle, with distinct weak spots requiring precise strikes for successful takedowns in role playing games. Targeting these critical areas not only repels your foes but also boosts your arsenal of tactical equipment. This roguelike RPG lets you tailor your combat style uniquely in each battle by choosing from three dynamically generated skills that enhance your capabilities in real-time for roguelike gameplay.

Your strategic choices in skill upgrades are crucialâ€”they refine your current battle strategies and lay groundwork for upcoming challenges with solo leveling. Whether you opt for overpowering strength or tactical stealth, your fighting style will evolve based on solo leveling and tactical decisions you make under pressure. Picture Cell Survivor as a game of chess, but with bio-warfare elements where every move solo leveling your character towards mastery in cell environments.

ğŸŒŸ **Game Features**:
1. Challenging Virus Bosses: Each virus boss in Cell Survivor exhibits unique behaviors and vulnerabilities. Mastering their patterns and capitalizing on their weaknesses is essential to dominate the game in survival games. ğŸ¯
2. Roguelike Skill Choices: Embodying the core of both roguelike and role playing games genres, Cell Survivor provides a plethora of skills that cater to your strategic choices for roguelike RPG. This diversity guarantees that no two playthroughs are alike, offering limitless replayability and varied tactical engagements in tower defense style. âš”ï¸
3. Diverse Levels: The game levels in Cell Survivor range vastly in terms of difficulty and required strategic approaches, necessitating the discovery of the most effective skill combinations to triumph quickly in role playing games with cell challenges.

Whether you are an experienced survival games enthusiast seeking a new challenge or a newcomer drawn to the unique combination of strategic depth and solo leveling in role playing games, Cell Survivor delivers a heart-racing experience from beginning to end. Step into the role of a microscopic hero navigating a vast and hostile cell environment. With its unique mix of roguelike gameplay and RPG depth, surviving in Cell Survivor means not just enduring but thriving and making your mark in the cell cosmos! ğŸŒŒ

Gear up for a distinctive survival games and RPG experience. Hone your skills in this cell survivor journey, strategize your pathway in cell-based battles, and dominate the microscopic realm in roguelike survival! The journey of a cell survivor starts now in cell survival. Are you prepared to thrive in the cell universe? ğŸ›¡ï¸

title: Call of DutyÂ®: Mobile
summary:
DMZ: Recon introduces a new tactical extraction experience in Call of Duty: Mobile, launching with Serpent Island, a brand-new map, and Building 21, a returning favorite from the original DMZ on PC and console. Players will complete contracts, outsmart hostiles and enemy squads, and extract their loot to grow stronger with each run.

CALL OF DUTYÂ® like never before, bringing fast-paced FPS action to your fingertips.

Jump into intense Multiplayer battles with classic modes like Team Deathmatch, Domination, and Kill Confirmed on legendary maps such as Shipment, Raid, and Standoff. Prefer Battle Royale? Squad up and conquer with dynamic modes like Tank Isolated and Training Ground, set in an iconic battlefield.

Battle Royale chaos awaits! Explore all 5 POIs, fight to survive, and claim victory. Or, team up with friends for action-packed Multiplayer matches on fan-favorite maps like Nuketown.

Join millions of players and dominate the battlefield in CALL OF DUTYÂ®: MOBILEâ€”the ultimate free-to-play FPS experience. Whether itâ€™s fast 5v5 team deathmatches, epic Zombies mode, or all-out Battle Royale warfare, the action never stops.

Lock and loadâ€”your next mission starts now!

DOWNLOAD FOR FREE TODAY
CALL OF DUTYÂ®: MOBILE boasts console quality HD gaming on your phone with customizable and intuitive controls, voice and text chat with your friends, and thrilling 3D graphics and sound. Enjoy controller games? We got you! Experience this iconic FPS franchise, on the go. Play this FPS gun game anywhere. Every mission feels like a high-stakes delta operation, pushing your shooting skills to the limit.

NEW SEASONAL CONTENT UPDATED MONTHLY
CALL OF DUTYÂ®: MOBILE has a variety of FPS game modes, maps, themed events, and rewards so it never gets old. Every season expands upon the story in the CALL OF DUTYÂ® universe and brings new & unique unlockable content. Jump into battle royale today!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR UNIQUE LOADOUT
Unlock and earn dozens of iconic operators, weapons, outfits, score streaks, and new pieces of gear, allowing you to play CALL OF DUTYÂ®: MOBILE your way.

COMPETITIVE AND SOCIAL PLAY
Fan of war multiplayer games? Gather your friends and test your mettle in competitive ranked mode or sharpen your aim in social play. Join a clan for a sense of community and earn unique rewards for participating in Clan Wars. With every encounter, experience the sheer force of this legendary FPS shooter game.

DOWNLOAD OPTIONS TO REDUCE APP SIZE
Download and play CALL OF DUTYÂ®: MOBILE without the barrier of storage space. As part of an effort to make CALL OF DUTYÂ®: MOBILE more accessible, the initial app download size has been reduced and additional options allow players to choose what is downloaded to experience the full game, such as HD resources, maps, weapons, and operators.

Have what it takes to compete with the best? Download CALL OF DUTYÂ®: MOBILE now!

title: Prince GO
summary:
The Supreme God is calling! Break free from your dull daily routine and embark on a unique adventure! Claim the legendary throne and build your very own fantasy world!

Epic RPG Battles Await
- Wield legendary swords to crush enemies, defeat bosses, and gather treasure!
- Join thrilling battles to earn coins and enhance your heroes' abilities!
- Experience advanced gear and weapon systems, along with powerful defensive mechanics!

Endless Exploration & Idle Progression
- With the auto-battle system and idle growth mechanics, your prince trains himself and grows stronger over time!
- Venture into dark, mysterious adventures and explore a fantasy world full of endless rewards!
- Level up your princeâ€™s abilities to face increasingly powerful monsters!

Simple Progression & Conquering Victory
- Heroes with dazzling skills can take on even the toughest opponents!
- Collect loyal pets and legendary treasures to aid in your grand adventure!
- Defeat enemies efficiently, overcome obstacles with allies, and carve your path to victory!

Diverse Gameplay & Rich Rewards
- Take on exciting game modes like Lord's Charge, Coin Mines, Goblin Villages, Magic Lamp Trials, and Mine Exploration!
- Unique challenges and countless rewards await your adventure!
- Join us and dive into the enchanting world of this rogue-like RPG to enjoy one of the best mobile game experiences!

title: Empires & Puzzles: Match-3 RPG
summary:
Empires & Puzzles is a completely new take on match-3 puzzle games, combining RPG elements, PvE quests, and base-building â€” topped off with epic PvP duels that range from riveting 1v1 Raids to rambunctious 100v100 Wars.

Start your fantasy adventure today!

â€¢ Solve match-3 puzzles

Lead your army to victory by matching colorful shields and unleashing epic combos! This isn't your everyday gem game â€” matching tiles will not only deal damage to your enemies, but also charge powerful spells that you can fire at the right time to devastating effect. Setting off dream cascades will allow you to take down even the most powerful of dragons!

â€¢ Explore 5 full seasons of content â€” plus many dozens of mythical quests

Prepare for an epic match-3 adventure that will take you through all sorts of worlds for a genuine RPG experience! Will your team be strong and sturdy enough to sail stormy seas, fend against underworld monsters, crawl through sandy dungeons, and slay titanic dragons â€” while also making tons of new friends along the way?

â€¢ Amazing graphics

This puzzle RPG is set in a beautifully rendered fantasy world â€” you'll marvel at the stunning details of countless monsters, dragons, and other fantasy creatures! Your heroes' powerful magic spells will not only dazzle your eyes but also dramatically turn the tides of wars.

â€¢ Base-building

Rebuild the ruins of a mighty castle and turn it into your own war fortress! A finely built Stronghold will provide all the tools you need to farm resources, level up armies, research special recipes, and harness the magic power of gems to alchemically merge various items.

â€¢ Farming, crafting, upgrading

Make sure your team is well-prepared for all the adventures out there! Level up your castle and gather valuable resources â€” such as Dragon Bones and Meteor Fragments â€” to craft legendary weapons that will help your heroes make it through even the toughest dungeons!

â€¢ Hero card collection

Hundreds of legendary heroes and dozens of mighty troops await collection â€” summon new allies to bolster your team and unlock new strategy options! Each hero comes with their own unique stats and skills â€” find your own way to merge & match their strengths to victory.

â€¢ Train and dress up

Unlike in ordinary hero card games, you can level up your "deck" of heroes â€” and even evolve their power further by equipping them with costumes that add to their power! The vast fantasy world of Empires & Puzzles will present a wide array of challenges; you'll want to build an army that can tackle any epic match-3 duel this puzzle game throws your way.

â€¢ Go on online raids for great loot

Clash blades â€” and spells â€” in intense match-3 RPG battles with other empires! Whether you're raiding enemy castles to plunder resources, setting up defenses for your own fort, or going to war together with your Alliance for a real-time puzzle RPG experience, proving your mettle in PvP duels will grant you great rewards that can't be found in regular dungeons.

â€¢ Play together

Joining an Alliance to team up with like-minded players will enrich your experience by a thousandfold! Strong bonds will naturally form and evolve once you start playing together â€” whether it be fighting epic titans, covering for each other in multiplayer wars, exploring treacherous islands full of monsters, or speedrunning dungeons to unlock better loot for the gang.

Start building your Empire now â€” the villagers of your new Stronghold await!

Follow us:
http://www.empiresandpuzzles.com

Empires & Puzzles is FREE to download and includes optional in-game purchases (including random items). Information about drop rates for random item purchases can be found in-game. If you wish to disable in-game purchases, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tabletâ€™s Settings.

title: Sengoku Fubu
summary:
A TRUE GAME OF SENGOKU EXPERIENCE

â€¢ Become a Lord of Sengoku: develop your terrain to conquer the map and unify the state

â€¢ Choose wisely: over 150 legendary characters from Sengoku period can be recruited

â€¢ Behold the beauty of authentic Ukiyoe: hundreds of cities and heroes in this floating world have been reproduced



CONQUEST WITH POWERFUL HERO

â€¢ Each Hero has their own skills and abilities

â€¢ Create powerful officer teams to conquer the map

â€¢ Deploy different type of troops to counter different enemy



BATTLE LIKE AN EMPEROR & BATTLE AS THE EMPEROR

â€¢ Raise your army and master strategy to rule the battlefield and live out your own fantasy in Sengoku period

â€¢ Defend your cities and protect the source of resources

â€¢ Win the match and establish your own state

â€¢ Build school and help your men



JOIN THE COMMUNITY AND FIGHT WITH THEM

â€¢ Win the victory together with your friend

â€¢ Send reinforcements and clash against rivals



Will you win a stunning battle with your ally, or fight alone to against the whole world, or fall victim to the other great lords of Sengoku in this RTS game? The choice is up to you. Remember, only best strategy will rule the battlefield.



Download Sengoku Fubu today!



Find us!

â€¢Friend Us on Facebook â€“ https://www.facebook.com/sengokufubu.en/

â€¢Chat with Us on Discord â€“ https://discord.gg/FKC2k6f

â€¢Contact Us in Game â€“ Tap Help Button on Top Right Corner

title: Merge CookingÂ®
summary:
Do you know you can enjoy the food around the world without traveling?
Do you know you can master the secret of cooking with just a few simple steps?
Tie your apron and put your chef hat on!
In Merge Cooking, you can cook anything!

- Welcome, Chef!
Your assistant Lea is waiting for you to start the adventure of opening restaurants and serving customers around the world. Merge Cooking not only allows you to cook as a star chef and master the world cuisine but also helps you realize your designer dream and renovate Michelin star restaurants!

- Start a food tour!
ENJOY Eggs Benedict in New York, DRINK Tom Yam Gong in Bangkok, ROLL Sushi in Tokyo, DINE on Escargot in Parisâ€¦ Merge Cooking takes you on a world tour, city by city! You will unlock a world-famous dish every day and discover more exciting and challenging recipes to hone your cooking skills.
Various local cuisines â€“ Taco, Kebab, Ramen and more.
Numerous restaurant themes â€“ fast food, BBQ, seafood and more.

- Play with ingredients!
MERGE ingredients with the simple steps â€“ tap, drag & merge! Quality delicacy requires nothing but basic ingredients!
COOK with the help of machines â€“ seven pieces of equipment that bring you extra fun! Simulate real-life cooking and prepare the food in a fun way! Frying pan, juice blender, oven and cocktail shakerâ€¦ everything you need to prepare a decent meal will be on standby. Say goodbye to overcooked pies and charred steaks!

- Eat outside the box!
Mozzarella, pecan, coconut, lobster, champagneâ€¦ Find everything you need to become a world-famous chef. Merge them to serve hungry customers! Discover more as you play! Unlock special souvenirs as you travel. How about sending a postcard from Hollywood?

- Every flavor tells a story!
Nothing makes people more connected than good food. Get familiar with the American restaurant owner who's also a football coach and the French restaurant manager who's elegant but picky. Greet customers from all walks of life. Learn their stories and write more of your own!

In Merge Cooking youâ€™ll:
âˆš MERGE fruits, vegetables, cheese and UNCOVER other numerous ingredients.
âˆš COOK exotic and fantastic dishes and TRAVEL to different countries.
âˆš SIMULATE real-life cooking with different cooking equipment.
âˆš RENOVATE restaurants with fresh new designs.
âˆš UPGRADE culinary skills and MASTER global recipes.
âˆš RELAX by enjoying great delicacy. No time pressure!
âˆš CLAIM amazing rewards and gifts.

title: The King of Fighters '98UM OL
summary:
KOF'98 UM OL" 7th Anniversary Release! The super popular title masterpiece fighting game "THE KING OF FIGHTERS" (abbreviated as "KOF") has finally reached its 7th anniversary! As a commemoration, a new LR fighter will appear!
We will hold a 7th anniversary thanksgiving festival where you can receive gorgeous rewards with gratitude to all the players who always support "KOF'98 UM OL"!
Let's join the event and celebrate the 7th anniversary together!

[Game Features]

â–¼Faithful reproduction of popular KOF charactersâ–¼
The familiar KOF All Stars such as Kyo Kusanagi, Iori Yagami, and Mai Shiranui are in full force!
That street-style fierce battle, fighting scenes, sounds, special moves, even character voices are reproduced as they are, and they are unfolding in front of you again! The battle of KOF never ends...

â–¼Collaboration unique to SNKâ–¼
Popular KOF fighters familiar with SNK Samurai Spirits such as Haohmaru, Ukyo Tachibana, and Nakoruru have collaborated!
A dream tag battle with strong men from different dimensions who have traveled beyond time and space in search of strength!
A new serious game full of tension begins again!

â–¼ Your own dream team â–¼
Breaking through the restrictions of a team of three people, allowing many KOF characters to participate at the same time.
Choose your favorite KOF characters as members without being bound by the team frame, create your own dream team, and defeat the enemy through the unique fists of KOF fighters!

â–¼ Advantageous formation of the team â–¼
Attack power and defense power increase depending on the formation of the team. Devise the arrangement and attack order of KOF characters, and develop a battle strategically with a formation suitable for your team!

â–¼ Exhilarating combo experience â–¼
A new sensation battle that connects combos with rhythm taps!
Tap the KOF characters at the right time and aim for perfection!

â–¼ Equipped with the first battle QTE continuous attack system â–¼
Each KOF character's unique "special move" can be revived with your own hands! A simple tap activates super special moves such as Orojanagi, Yawakime, and Kono Shoken.
Grab the rhythm of the battle, aim for the perfect timing to unleash your moves, and enjoy the exhilarating combo!

â–¼ Variety of play modes â–¼
In addition to classic story quests, KOF now has a variety of PVE + PVP modes such as gacha, talent, ultimate trial, KOF tournament, female KOF fighter, clone team battle, fighter legend, arena, arena between servers, brawl street, etc. appeared in the world of

Challenge the strongest champion, excite the KOF world, and establish an undefeated legend on all servers!

Now, in "KOF'98 UM OL", which perfectly reproduces "THE KING OF FIGHTERS", become a true champion with the Fighters of the KOF world in a heated battle unique to fighting games!

Contact: kof98@fingerfun.co.jp
Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/kof98umol

title: LINE Bubble 2
summary:
Shoot! Pop! Bubbles?!ã€€
Fresh, fun, and unique shooting puzzles!

LINE GAME's hallmark bubble shooting game!
Brown and Cony will invite you to go on a fun adventure!

â– Game Story
Brown set out on an adventure and disappeared.
After a long journey to find Brown, Cony finally found his pocket watch!
Just then, a red dragon suddenly appeared and dragged Cony into the mysterious world inside the watch.
Believing the dragon's words that Brown is waiting for Cony to solve the final mystery, Cony continues forward, unraveling the mysteries of the bubbles as she goes!

â– How to Play
- Throw bubbles and match three or more of the same type to pop them!
- Continuing the combo brings out special Bomb bubbles!
- Clear stages by completing the specified missions before running out of bubbles!

â– Main Features
- Thousands of various stages from a simple level to hard and super hard difficulty levels!
- All kinds of gimmicks updated in each episode!
- Enjoy various types of maps where you need to collect Bubbles, where you have a time limit, where you need to rescue friends, etc.
- Meet powerful boss monsters, too!
- Also! Check out a mode where you can compete in the Rankings with game friends!
- Exchange Flames with other Club members and enjoy Club-exclusive content!
- Take part in tie-up events that are held on a regular basis and get limited tie-up Buddies!

â– Good Things About Bubble 2
- Regardless of OSes, you can play Bubble 2 on mobile phones or tablets!
- It's not just a simple game! It's also recommended for someone who wants to play shooting puzzles for brain training or to feel a sense of accomplishment!
- You can play this bubble shooting game for free!
- Brown, Cony, and a lot more popular LINE FRIENDS characters appear in the game!
- It's not just the usual match 3 game. It's a shooting bubble style!

Come and play this bubble shooting game now!

title: Travel Town - Merge Adventure
summary:
Explore Travel Town, where you can combine everything into better and more useful items while you travel the world!

Reveal secrets as you discover yourself and help the friendly people of Travel Town!

TRAVEL TOWN FEATURES:

== Merge Objects ==
â€¢ Discover over 500 fantastic objects through hundreds of levels!
â€¢ Freely drag objects around the beautiful world and merge 2 of a kind evolve them into more superior items!
â€¢ Fulfill missions for the townsfolk to unlock more amazing items!

== Meet New Villagers ==
â€¢ Discover 55 villagers who live in Travel Town, and help them restore their seaside town!
â€¢ Match objects to upgrade them and unlock more and more items to support you on your journey!

== Rebuild the Town ==
â€¢ A storm has ravaged Travel Town - Collect coins and bring the town back to its former beauty!
â€¢ Discover and upgrade dozens of buildings and improve the town beyond your wildest dreams!

Follow Travel Town on Facebook and Instagram for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: facebook.com/TravelTownGame/
Instagram: instagram.com/traveltowngame/

Terms of Service: https://magmatic.games/terms-and-conditions-mg
Privacy Notice: https://magmatic.games/privacy-policy-mg/

Questions about the game? Contact us in the game by clicking on Settings > Contact Us
Our support is also ready and waiting at: https://support.traveltowngame.com/

title: Match Factory!
summary:
Dive into the fascinating world of Match Factory, the brand new puzzle game from the creators of Toon Blast & Toy Blast. Once you play, you will come for Match Factory every day!

Connect identical items, sort tiles, and clear the board in this mesmerizing match 3D game. Challenge your puzzle-solving skills as you keep sorting and matching objects until every item is cleared from the screen. Itâ€™s not just a puzzle; itâ€™s a test of your wit and strategy.

Relax and Have Fun! Leave your worries behind and enjoy quality relaxation and fun. Immerse yourself in the soothing game atmosphere , enjoy your brain time and increase your zen!

Play Anytime, Anywhere without WI-FI! Enjoy the game online or offline, and never worry about Wi-Fi. Whether youâ€™re on a grand adventure or simply taking a break, Match Factory will always be there to entertain you. In-app purchases do require an active internet connection.

Become the Master of 3D Puzzles! Time is of the essence in this match 3d game! With each level equipped with a timer, youâ€™ll need to think fast and act even faster to triumph!

Boosters to the Rescue! Stuck on a level? Fear not! Match Factory offers a range of powerful boosters to help you overcome tricky situations. Utilize these remarkable tools to advance through the game and unlock exciting items like fruits, candy, cake objects and much more!

Immerse yourself in the world of Match Factory, where thrilling 3D puzzles and hidden objects awaits your keen eye and sharp mind! Download Match Factory now and prove your matching skills to the world! Can you conquer every level and emerge as the ultimate puzzle master?

The Factory Gates Are Open - Start Matching Now!

Match Factory is free to download and includes optional in-game purchases. If you wish to disable in-game purchases, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tabletâ€™s Settings.

You must be at least 13 years of age, or such higher age as required in your country, to play or download Match Factory.

title: LORDNINE : Infinite Class
summary:
â€œThe master of this worldâ€¦is now you.â€
On a vast continent ruled by nine Lords,
you have been chosen by Orphe
to awaken as the legendary tenth Lord.
A grand tale of freedom, battle, and glory begins now!

â–  Play Your Way, A Class System Without Limits!
Choose from over 60 classes and switch between them instantly.
Mix and match weapons and combat styles to define your unique playstyle.
Customize your skill sets with the Ability + Tag system!

â–  Stunning Graphics Anyone Can Enjoy
Characters brought to life through motion capture and 3D photogrammetry.
Optimized with the Unity engine for smooth performance, even on low-end devices.
Enjoy full cross-play between PC and mobile!

â–  A Fair and Open Economy
Intuitive, transparent probability mechanics.
1:1 player trading and a free-market system
Forget pay-to-win! Everything you wear is earned, not bought!

â–  Forge Your Legend, Only in LORDNINE!
A world where anyone can rise to power.
Live the full, authentic MMORPG experience, your path, your story, only in LORDNINE!

title: Tiles Survive!
summary:
Enter the world of "Tiles Survive!" and guide your team of survivors through a harsh wilderness. As the core of your survivor team, explore the wild, gather key resources, and use them wisely to strengthen your shelter.
Venture into different tiles and expand your territory. Improve how you manage resources, build and upgrade structures, and connect electricity to speed up production. Create a self-sufficient shelter where every decision shapes your survivorsâ€™ future.

Game Features:

â— Operations & Management
Enhance your production structures for smoother workflows. Use electricity to run your shelter more efficiently. Unlock and upgrade more structures to meet your growing needs.

â— Assign Survivors
Assign jobs to your survivors, like hunters, chefs, or lumberjacks. Pay attention to their health and morale to keep productivity high.

â— Resource Collection
Explore further and discover unique resources in different biomes. Gather and use every resource to your advantage.

â— Multi-map & Collectibles
Travel through multiple maps to find loot and special items. Bring them back to decorate and improve your shelter.

â— Recruit Heroes
Find heroes with special skills and traits who boost your shelterâ€™s capabilities.

â— Form Alliances
Team up with friends to stand against common threats, such as severe weather and wild creatures.

In "Tiles Survive!", every choice matters. How you manage resources, plan your shelter, and explore the unknown will decide your fate. Are you ready to face the challenge and thrive in the wild? Download now and begin your epic adventure!

title: Rogue with the Dead: Idle RPG
summary:
Rogue with the Dead is an original roguelike RPG where you command and power up troops on an endless, looping journey.
What kills you makes you stronger.

An innovative game from room6, the team that has brought you such successes as Unreal Life and Genâ€™ei AP.

â—†Defeat the Demon Lord


Your mission is to lead an envoy of soldiers for 300 miles, in order to defeat the Demon Lord at the end.
Completing quests and killing monsters will earn you coins that you can use to make your troops stronger.
They fight automatically, and you can choose to either wait and watch them have at it or join the battle yourself.

Soldiers respawn after theyâ€™re killed, but you donâ€™t. Youâ€™ll lose all soldiers, money, and items, except for artifacts, and youâ€™ll have to start over.

To stand a chance against the powerful bosses impeding your progress, youâ€™ll need to collect as many artifacts as you can. Defeating them, in turn, will grant you more artifacts.

â—†Many different playstyles


ãƒ»Power up soldiers, defeat monsters, and clear dungeons
ãƒ»An endless loop of dungeons
ãƒ»Hire healers, summoners, magicians, and more to fight for you
ãƒ»Defend yourself from the incoming enemies in true tower defense fashion
ãƒ»Power up quests to earn more coins automatically in idle mode
ãƒ»No annoying controls required as most of the game can be played while idling
ãƒ»Find even stronger soldiers to defeat tough bosses
ãƒ»Collect many useful artifacts
ãƒ»Gather ingredients to cook meals to enhance your soldiersâ€™ powers
ãƒ»Compete with other players in the online leaderboard
ãƒ»Roguelite mechanics, making you stronger every time you start over

â—†A beautiful pixel art world


Travel through a fantastic world and its story drawn in beautiful pixel art. Enjoy the journey to the Demon Lordâ€™s castle together with your troops and your guide Elly.
Little by little, youâ€™ll find out about what happened before your arrival, and Elly might know more than she lets on...

â—†Watch the numbers grow


At first, youâ€™ll deal 10 or 100 points of damage. As you progress, the numbers will grow in the millions, billions, trillions... Enjoy the exponential growth of your power.

â—†A varied roster of soldiers


Swordsman


A basic warrior unit with high health who fights on the front line to protect other soldiers.

Ranger


An archer that can attack from afar. However, it is slower and has less health than warriors.

Pigmy


A tiny warrior with low health and weak attack, but very fast movement. It can quickly sneak close to enemies to attack them directly.

Sorcerer


A magician that deals high damage to enemies within an area. However, it is slow and rather fragile.

...and many more.

â—†Artifacts that power you up


ãƒ»Increase attack by 50%
ãƒ»Protect magicians from 1 attack
ãƒ»Increase all coins earned by 50%
ãƒ»1% of all soldiers' attack is added to the tap attack
ãƒ»Soldiers have a 1% probability of spawning at giant size
ãƒ»Necromancers can summon 1 additional skeleton

...and many more

â—†If youâ€™re tired, just idle


If you want to take a break, just close the game. Quests will still continue even while youâ€™re not playing the game. When you come back, youâ€™ll have more coins to power up your soldiers and defeat that boss that has been giving you trouble.
You can play for a few minutes at a time, so itâ€™s perfect to fill in those little pockets of time throughout the day.

â—†Youâ€™ll probably like this game if...


ãƒ»You like idle games
ãƒ»You like â€œclickerâ€ games
ãƒ»You like strategy games
ãƒ»You like RPGs
ãƒ»You like pixel art
ãƒ»You like tower defense games
ãƒ»You like roguelike or roguelite games
ãƒ»You like endless dungeon exploration games
ãƒ»You like seeing numbers grow exponentially

title: Ant Legion: For The Swarm
summary:
In a land long forgotten, a chanced encounter is bringing a twist of fate for the ant leader. Bestowed with incredible power by a mysterious mantis, a painful struggle conspires. The ant army is about to face a challenge that greater than any beforeâ€¦
Join the Ant Legion and write your own legend in this mutation adventure.

â€”â€” Surviving the underground world â€”â€”

ã€High-quality graphics showcase the world of ants ã€‘
Lincensed by renowned natural science photography sites
Thousands of HD photos of ants across the globe
Learn about the natural world through playing our game

ã€Build your own ant colonyã€‘
Expand your colony and build up your base!
Deploy the best builders of the natural world
Plan the development of your colony and design an underground fortress!

ã€Hatch giant ants and strengthen your legionsã€‘
Ants from all corners of the world!
Hatch and raise to different types of ants for your legions!
Train your ants into resilient soliders and destroy your enemies!

ã€Battle over resourcesã€‘
Find essential resources such as water and food for your colony!
Slay predators and protect your resources!

ã€Forge alliancesã€‘
Donâ€™t mess with the swarm!
Build alliances to survive and thrive!
Ensure survival through cooperation and allies!

ã€Gather your swarms and compete for the last tree stump!ã€‘
Lead your ant legions to glory!
Survival of the fittest!

title: Merge Mansion: Mystery & Story
summary:
Restore a forgotten mansion to its former glory â€“ and solve mysteries along the way! Can you uncover the secrets Grandma is hiding and reveal the truth behind the Boulton familyâ€™s past?

Unlock spaces and rooms in the garden and mansion by completing fun merge tasks. Collect clues, meet fascinating characters, and piece the story together one mystery at a time.

Relax into this cozy merge puzzle game packed with more twists and turns than Grandmaâ€™s knitting.

MATCH & MERGE
Merge matching items to upgrade, and use them to complete tasks. Enjoy the satisfaction of creating and discovering new items and chains!

RENOVATE & DECORATE
Restore the mansion and gardens to their former glory! Collect themed decorations and customize your home as you wish.

INVESTIGATE & SOLVE
Uncover hidden areas and combine clues to find out what secrets Grandma is hiding - how far down the mystery rabbit hole will you go?

EXCLUSIVE EVENTS
Play limited-time events to gain points, climb leaderboards, collect gorgeous decorations, and win big rewards!

Merge Mansion is the number one destination for a cozy mystery puzzle adventure - and it never gets boring! Download this free puzzle merge game and discover its secrets.

Merge Mansion may be updated from time to time for content or technical updates. If you do not install the provided updates, Merge Mansion may not function properly or at all.
